Reviews.Content: Fantastic TV. The picture is really amazing, although I did have to play with the settings for about half an hour to get it to look really good. Definitely turn off the "real motion" setting--what where they thinking with that? Before I found the setting for that, I thought I would have to return it. Also, yes, the sound is a little "thin", but it's not that bad. It's fine really. I got used to it quickly. I only really notice it if I listen to my other tv downstairs, which is hooked up to speakers.

Reviews.Title: Pat Myself on the Back for this Purchase!
Reviews.Author: INDALU
Reviews.Content: Our 20 year old TV finally died.  (Rest in peace old friend.)  I did a lot of research and this seemed to be the best value for the money.  But you just never really know until it's in your home.  I am happy to report that the TV surpassed our expectations.  The color and picture quality are phenomenal.  It was so easy to set up, and I am not a Technie.  I also purchased a wireless LAN adaptor from eBay, so we can access Amazon Instant Video and Netflix.  I'm very pleased overall. Pat myself on the back!

Reviews.Title: Excellent LED TV for the Price with Great Features and Clear Picture.
Reviews.Author: Daniel S
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to replace a 42 inch LG Plasma TV that broke unexpectedly. First of all, this one which has a larger screen yet is still much thinner and lighter than the LG Plasma.  It also does not raise the room temperature by several degrees like the plasma did!  It has a beautiful look to it and the design is very sharp.The picture is bright and clear with vivid colors. The remote is easy to use and the TV has lots of functionality.  The wide viewing angle makes it perfect for use in the family room since people can see it well from all of the seating areas. Sports look great on the screen and the HD picture is incredibly clear.  It makes for great slide shows to show vacation photos too using either the SD Card or USB ports! Set up was easy and took very little time.The only downside is the sound (which others noted) and which could be clearer and louder. This is the only reason I didn't give the TV 5 stars.  I think that speakers which are located in the back of the TV like the Panasonic's are don't project as well nor sound as good as TVs that have them in the front.  This is the only downside I have found so far. At some point I will likely get a sound bar.Overall I really like this TV and enjoy the great picture. I highly recommend this Panasonic TV. For the price, it can't be beat!

Reviews.Title: A great TV!
Reviews.Author: Chase S Porter
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV, the colors are vivid and we haven't had any problems. We really like having Youtube and Netflix at our fingertips without having to mess with the Xbox 360 or blu-ray player. Our only issue was that the speakers are on the bottom of the TV and face downwards, so the sound can be very quiet at time. We used this as justification to get the surround sound system we wanted!

Reviews.Title: What a great TV
Reviews.Author: Sascha
Reviews.Content: This Panasonic is so easy to use, and has such beautiful picture quality. I had to turn off the super High-Def 120hz thang to get back to a more filmic look, but once the settings were right.... parfait. Also - they make set-up with all your devices super easy, and it arrived in terrific shape. 42" was just the right size... Would totally buy Panasonic again.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Dr John Sagehorn
Reviews.Content: I have 4 other t vs and was very surprised that the picture was very good. The price was right for this size tv. Other TVs for this size were twice as much. It shipped on time and came through the process in good shape. I ordered a cable and it was faulty. In the future I will get a better one. Future customers should buy the middle priced instead of the cheap one.  Thanks Doc

Reviews.Title: Great product!!!
Reviews.Author: Yvette
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV for my husband as a gift for Father's Day!!! He has used it 2 days so far, but it is a great smart tv and he is super happy with his gift.  The shipping was quick and without any problems... Totally recommend this item to other potential buyers.  :)

Reviews.Title: Great picture, above average apps
Reviews.Author: Thomas Lightle
Reviews.Content: This TV is super light, super slim, and the picture is phenomenal.  The apps are decent with a pretty good selection.  I only use 2 apps: Youtube is pretty robust and I can search and control everything with my Youtube app on my iPad or iPhone.  The Amazon Prime app is a little half-baked, but in my opinion is better than having nothing at all.  Also better than having to buy a Roku or something else to attach to the TV as well, so overall I am very satisfied with the TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, my pros and cons
Reviews.Author: Peter W.
Reviews.Content: PROS:Very good picture quality (with some tweaking)bright picturenot very reflectiveGreat valuePretty thinweb appsSD card slot to view photos, video or musicApp for iOS (iPhone) and Android to stream media to TV or use as a remote control4 HDMI inputsattractive design47''CONS:black levels are so sosome light leakagesome blown/dead pixels in my casebuilt in speakers (audio) is a little weakpersistent red lamp on frontno RCA audio outputsI ordered it here at amazon, price is really amazing: http://amzn.to/11Hw1yp

Reviews.Title: Nice TV Overall: 4 Star Due to Poor Sound and Glossy Screen
Reviews.Author: bmcclure
Reviews.Content: I bought this 47" LED TV to mount in my living room. I did not purchase this with the highest expectations for picture quality and understood that it was not a high-end model. This TV fits my needs very nicely as a mid-range LED TV.The thin design of the TV is very nice and has a low profile when mounted on my wall. The picture quality is not bad and has nice viewing angles.Our only complaints about this TV are:1. Sound Quality - we knew that the speakers in LED TVs are weak so we expected this when purchasing the TV. Poor quality sound is just par for the course when it comes to LED TVs since bigger speakers cannot be packed into the thin design of LED TVs.2. Very glossy screen - the glossy screen was somewhat surprising. I saw a few other reviews that mentioned this aspect and did not think much of it. Where the TV is mounted in our living room we can easily get glare from multiple windows and lights. I originally had the picture settings changed to have lower brightness but I tweaked the settings a bit to help reduce how noticeable the glare is. With a brighter backlight setting the glare is not as noticeable but it is still annoying.All of that being said, this is a great TV for the price I paid. Landing a 47" LED TV for under $550 is a great deal. I cannot complain about a mid-range TV and compare to high-end units that would cost over $1k. I would definitely recommend this TV to friends and family.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Anon E. Mouse
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture.  Wired streaming has worked well with hulu+, netflix, and youtube.  Sound is a little cave-y (i.e. sounds like there's 1 speaker somewhere behind the TV).  Bought a soundbar to add a bit more depth to the sound (a 5.1 or 7.1 system would be better still).

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV for my needs
Reviews.Author: Wayne "Fan"
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a new living room TV to replace my 32' Toshiba. It's amazing. Thinnest TV I've ever seen, and the colours and depth of picture? Incredible. I used to hate HD, but this TV changed my mind on it.Since I don't have a cable subscription, but instead Netflix and Amazon Prime, it was a big selling point that this TV is an "Internet TV", meaning once you connect the wireless adapter you can connect directly to your video subscription of choice and watch without having any game consoles or Blu-Ray players connected.Over all, if you're looking for a new TV this one is incredible.

Reviews.Title: Smart?
Reviews.Author: J. Haddad
Reviews.Content: +Would have given 5*, but for the fact that the TV does not connect to the internet, and does not have decent RCA jacks on the TV. I didnt do my homework very well and missed this fact. Panasonic wants $160 for the USB dongle that will connect wirelessly to the web. After examining several options (Roku, Blu-Ray players, 100' direct LAN connection) I chose the Panasonic DMP-BDT220 Integrated Wi-Fi 3D Blu-ray DVD Player. Cheaper than the dongle and I got a new disk player as well. Being both Panasonic the remotes are compatible and the disk remote will do it all except for channel changes. All in all a stunning TV, great pic on reg DVD's. My sound equiptment is upper end, but 20+ years old, all RCA. I jumped thru many hoops to get my home stereo connected for sound. Love the TV, tho.

Reviews.Title: Very nice picture quality
Reviews.Author: Jayanti Dabhere
Reviews.Content: I really like the Panasonic Vierra Connect feature. Best of all I paid only $400 for this TV because it was on sale. Totally worth the price!

Reviews.Title: The Sound is VERY BADBUT the rest makes up for it
Reviews.Author: Paula Robinson "book lover"
Reviews.Content: I love the picture. I love the ease of use. It fits perfectly for our room.I DON'T like the sound. We did quite a bit of research on this TV, and the overall review was the same -- the sound was bad, but the quality of everything else was excellent.

Reviews.Title: Really beautiful TV after we ironed out the details.
Reviews.Author: GJ
Reviews.Content: Once we figured out how to get rid  of "soap opera effect" ....and like everyone else we don't know exactly how we did it it looked great.  We also had to mess around to get it to sync sound wise with the action with our sound system it was awesome.  Glad I bought the 47 inch....it is not too big. Love it g.

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Kyle
Reviews.Content: I actually chose to buy this TV because there was a sale going on and I could get all sorts of other goodies along with it, but I love this thing. I haven't had a single problem with it, the picture is great regardless of what I'm using it for.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: GexDrew12
Reviews.Content: The TV is a really great buy. Honestly, if you are just looking for a nice LED TV for a good price you can't go wrong. It has plenty of HDMI ports and that's great for gaming and connecting a PC, plus other devices. This makes a great TV bedroom for it's size, that's what I use it as and so far it's crystal clear. I also use this mostly for gaming and I've experienced no problems.

Reviews.Title: Impressive
Reviews.Author: George R Richardson "Byte Doctor"
Reviews.Content: Love the picture, love the colors, love the size. Of course, there is considerable difference between a 27-in JVC tube-type display over 17years old, and a 47-in LED-LCD hi-def just in the size. As I get older, I find that the text on low-res displays leaves a lot to be desired, and I often kill the sound and just monitor the news peripheally when I'm working on the computer, enabling audio when something catches my eye. Also, like the multiple input choices, and the internet ready capability. I currently use a wired network connection, will eventually setup wireless. This enabled me to get "hooked" on streaming video, especially "Game of Thrones."

Reviews.Title: Picutre Great
Reviews.Author: Ronald Walker
Reviews.Content: Picture, internet feature, and remote are great. The sound from the rear facing speakers is not clear and rich. You need an external speaker system for good sound. The audio output doesn't does not have a  variable sound setting so you can control the external speaker system volumn with th TV remote.

Reviews.Title: Great TV viewing
Reviews.Author: Rebecca G. Hames
Reviews.Content: We are really enjoying the size and quality of this purchase. We had a 27" dinosaur TV and this one has such clarity of picture you feel like you are there.  Good product for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture!
Reviews.Author: John M.
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV to replace an older Sony 32 inch HD TV.  I find the picture to be as sharp as the Sony.  It is reasonably simple to set up and only takes a few minutes.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use and easy to set up
Reviews.Author: Colleen
Reviews.Content: I'm not a very high tech person, but setup was very easy and the picture is fantastic. Speakers are not all that great, but I knew that going in when I purchased a flat screen TV..... I purchased a Bose Solo and now the sound is fantastic!!!! I'm loving my new system.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PICTURE
Reviews.Author: Jackie
Reviews.Content: i LOVE THE TV.  i WAS DISAPPOINTED THAT THE TV WAS NOT CAPABLE OF GOING ONLINE RIGHT AWAY. THE ADAPTER TO CONNECT ONLINE COST ANOTHER $75.00.

Reviews.Title: Exceeded my expectations
Reviews.Author: Stephen Black
Reviews.Content: I looked at many TV reviews before choosing this Panasonic for my home office. I had friends with Panasonic TV's who were very satisfied and the reviews for the top of the line Panasonic's were excellent. This Panasonic is not their top of the line, isn't 3D which I didn't want but this picture is awesome, very easy to setup, internet ready (I have it setup), and for only $699. I'm very satisfied with no complaints or recommendation for improvements and actually received it from Amazon in one day, free delivery.

Reviews.Title: This is what I had expected, but could be better
Reviews.Author: dullard
Reviews.Content: Good picture quality, just the right size for my needs without a lot of extra plastic around the screen.  It got a lot more over-the-air channels than a dedicated digital TV converter even with the same antenna.  I really like the ultra low power usage, so I have it set up to display art and travel photos all day long.However, it fails to work with many USB drives, doesn't display all jpeg photos, and I can't find a movie format that it accepts (when playing from USB drives).  Even when using the exact codec that is recommended.It would be much improved if it had a randomize feature for photos or music.I recommend this if the price is right.  If not, there are better TVs out there.

Reviews.Title: Great TV! Just wish you didn't have to buy the wireless adapter separate so I give it 4 stars.
Reviews.Author: HonestReveiewsHomeConsumer
Reviews.Content: Pros:  * Great picture and sound  * Gaming is great, has it's own preset display modes  * Great price if you can find it on sale  * Very thin and lightCons:  * 1 of the HDMI ports is somewhat sensitive but works fine  * You have to buy the WiFi adapter separate, an extra $70

Reviews.Title: Original and new product
Reviews.Author: Danny Ramos
Reviews.Content: I chose this article because it's at a great price, excellent quality and I recommend it to you.thanks you

Reviews.Title: Great Price and Great Quality!!
Reviews.Author: Brad
Reviews.Content: The only regret I had from this purchase was not getting the 46" model. Great TV with Internet connection and Internet apps like Pandora and Youtube. The picture quality is great especially with video games and Blu-Ray movies!!

Reviews.Title: I'm very pleased with this one after about six weeks, but keep in mind that I'm not a pro at evaluating TVs.
Reviews.Author: Laura Kleinschmidt
Reviews.Content: I chose this model after spending a day online, reading reviews and rankings.  I was not in the market for all the bells and whistles nor a large TV, as my living room is quite small, and the 42" has proven to be perfect for my needs.  The picture is great, as well as the sound, and I thought the price was reasonable.  I also purchased the wi-fi option, and that's great for picking up Amazon Prime TV show and movie videos; it's too bad it's not included in the TV's package. Free delivery was prompt and appreciated.  I'm told the newer TVs do not last as long as the old tubes, but only time will tell.  It's all good right now.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Waldemar Nelson
Reviews.Content: Has met all of my expectations..we've really enjoyed viewing this TV..Panasonic has it heads above the rest here Sound could be a bit better..but super picture!!

Reviews.Title: Digital Audio output is in DTS for digital tv signal
Reviews.Author: Xiaochuan
Reviews.Content: I usually want to switch off the tv speaker and use headphone at night. But this tv only provide digital fiber output. And its digital signal is DTS for digital tv signal and PCM for analog tv signal or other sources. This requires you to have digital converter supporting dolby format, which is usually expensive, probably due to Dolby license.

Reviews.Title: Stoked on this TV!
Reviews.Author: gregory morrison
Reviews.Content: Great picture quality, great looking TV.  We bought in December, and have had nothing but great experience with this tv.  Not much else to say.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: DDinCT
Reviews.Content: After buying four different TV's at three different locations we finally got lucky and have one that works.Very easy to setup. Picture is awesome, had a 27" RCA about 30 yrs old (still worked). Sound no problem at all.I am very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a good price
Reviews.Author: jaspw
Reviews.Content: Bought this as an additional TV and am used to viewing a larger Panasonic plasma, which has a great picture.  This LED TV was surprisingly sharp, great contrast, deep color, great viewing angles and does fail in comparing favorably to the plasma.  With the ethernet connection, we really enjoy the streaming apps and Skype.  A very fine TV with good options at a decent price.  Set up was a breeze.  Recommend the Logitech HD Widescreen webcam for $39 here on Amazon that is Panasonic compatable if you are into Skype.  Works great.

Reviews.Title: this is a good to go with product from amazon
Reviews.Author: Ademola
Reviews.Content: colour is so good and the picture is as described in the ad. its slim design trills me a lot, it is easy to install and setup. streaming goes so fine with its wi-fi standard.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV with Panasonic quality
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I received this tv at the beginning of January and wanted to wait a while before posting a review. The picture is awesome, and the colors are very vivid. The sound is  very good, and if you want it better buy a sound bar. As this type of tv is limited for speaker space, I believe it does a very good job with whats available. If you want a great tv at a reasonable price this is the one to get. Remeber to buy the internet adaptor wl20u and there isnt any issues at all. I would have given it 5 stars  but it doesnt have a RCA audio out. Other than that small gripe its a perfect set at a better than perfect price.. Highly recomend it....

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Alex K
Reviews.Content: I use it as my main TV. It has low profile and nice picture. Even basic cable looks good. I looked at LG and Samsung, went with this Panasonic and love it so far. If you care about sound a lot you should buy a separate sound-bar.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good
Reviews.Author: tjf
Reviews.Content: Have enjoyed the larger screen.  It does give off an almost "soap opera"ish view of things that was annoying at first, but has become normal to me now.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV
Reviews.Author: smartnfunnygirl
Reviews.Content: This TV has amazing picture quality and I have no complaints about its performance overall.  It would be perfect if they would just change the following things:1.  Move the 4 HDMI ports further from the end of the TV so there is less risk of cords hanging out the side.2.  Have a dedicated video in and dedicated composite in rather than one connection that can be one or the other, but not both.Aside from these minor points, what you get is a fantastic TV at a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Wow! I'm thrilled!
Reviews.Author: susan nettles
Reviews.Content: I researched and watched the sales for a while before buying. I made a great choice and have had a perfect experience all around. The tv exceeds my expectations. I wanted to upgrade in size for the main room. Usually, I have purchased Sony Bravia, which has been my favorite.  This 55" smart Viera was the easiest to set up, and the definition is terrific. I felt as if I had put on the blu-ray player! The volume isn't an issue in the space I placed this television.  The white glove delivery was a nice touch. They delivered, unpacked and plugged the television in while I inspected the unit. I had some concerns after reading other reviewers, however, there are some very good reviews that I read - so based on that and my own research, I ordered it. I received a good price point and I think I will have years of enjoyment with the Panansonic Viera 55"!

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: Michael Stephen Fitzpatrick
Reviews.Content: I just love this TV.  The picture is amazing.......my wife and I are in awe of the color, clarity, and depth of the picture.  I am so happy I bought this set.

Reviews.Title: Great TV screen
Reviews.Author: Rene Coupal
Reviews.Content: The colors are just fineThe adjustment screen button is very handy if you are still receiving analog tv signals

Reviews.Title: High Quality picture
Reviews.Author: libertyinmo "libertyinmo"
Reviews.Content: My only disappointment with the television is that it will not see a USB external drive formatted in the same way as a USB memory stick or SD card. Not much can go on a USB stick or SD card, so I had hoped to hook up an external hard drive to the USB port as the directions stated USB mass storage device. Unfortunately, when the USB drive is formatted to the fat format and hooked up, the television doesn't recognize it.

Reviews.Title: so so tv
Reviews.Author: Nazzarus
Reviews.Content: its just OK. not enough connection option no wi-fi, you need an adapter or Ethernet. Picture is not as bright for a LED-LCD TV. very thin and aesthetically pleasing though.

Reviews.Title: Bad packaging
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: When I receive the package the box was bent up and rip up had me scared that my product had been destroyed. After opening it was not damage as far as i could tell. on a different note i was highly disappointed that even after buying the adapter i could not connect my tv to the internet. Going through Panasonic they could not be of assistance and i still haven't been able to get my tv online and now it is passed the date of return or warranty which really makes me worry about future purchases from amazon.

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied!
Reviews.Author: Patrick V Fenner
Reviews.Content: I took delivery of my TC-L42E50 Panasonic TV about a month ago now...and i am very satisfied with it.  It has a great picture!  I really don't care for a lot of "toys" because I'll never use them.  However, there are enough toys that my kids and grandkids will enjoy them.  There wasn't a scratch on the box when it arrived.  It also only took 2 or 3 days to ship!  Very happy so far.

Reviews.Title: Excellent picture
Reviews.Author: RICHARD HOLZMAN
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up and worked like it is supposed to. Picture is a little better than a 42" Vizio that I bought at the same time.It has internet if you can plug your router into the TV using the Ethernet plug, which is what I did.  Be aware that if you not have a router close enough to plug into the TV, you will have to buy a Panasonic wifi thingamagig for about $60-$100.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV for the $$
Reviews.Author: JoAnn Hamilton
Reviews.Content: This TV arrived amazingly fast and was very simple to unbox and set up.  It was a big upgrade for us so the picture quality and wide angle viewing really stood out in comparison to our old SD TV.Only upgrade would be to include the wireless LAN adaptor for internet TV, so we've waited and now it is out of stock.  A minor inconvenience as we dont really expect to use this feature very often.

Reviews.Title: a quality product
Reviews.Author: nora
Reviews.Content: the the picture quality is very good.  the tv remote is easily navigable and easy to understand.  the tv being wifi ready is a nice feature.

Reviews.Title: love it,
Reviews.Author: robert leroy ferry
Reviews.Content: This was her big present for Christmas, everything about it so far is great,  picture and sound are excellent.  I've had a half dozen Panasonic TV's in the past and still have 36" thats 12 years old and works perfectly.  And, of course the price was right, I could have bought four of these for what I paid for my Sony 42" ten years ago.  Gotta love electronics

Reviews.Title: So far so good....
Reviews.Author: Evan C Murray
Reviews.Content: So far this tv has been great.  It is a perfect size for the bedroom.  The picture quality is very good and the sound is goo as well.  Suits our needs.

Reviews.Title: I didn't realize that that people looked so "Bumpy" in HD!
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: It's a good TV.  I'm no expert, but at the price, I am delighted.I can hardly wait for "Game of Thrones" to start!

Reviews.Title: Great TV if you get it at the right price
Reviews.Author: T. Kamat "Tej"
Reviews.Content: I got this with the Amazon 100$ credit and for 400 bucks its an awesome TV. 500 bucks is probably the tops that I would pay for this, anything more and I suggest look elsewhere.Pros:Nice picture out of the box but got a lot better after I used recommended settings from AVSForum. Also turned off motion picture settings. With that on, it made the picture look so weird.Slim and with a low profile mount looks like a picture frame.Lots of ports.ConsWIFI ready, but you need to buy a 60$ dongle for it. Sounds like false advertising to me.The sound is really really bad. I was expecting it to be bad based on other reviews but this was a lot worse than I expected. At full volume you can just about hear it.Confusion over 60Hz and 120 Hz. I still am not sure what this is. Nowhere in the manual does it say 120Hz so I am guessing its 60.If it was 120 they would have highlighted it like the other manufacturers.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Stone Cold "HW-CHAMP"
Reviews.Content: Thanks guys for posting the game mode option.... the other mode is something I am not used to.  Picture is clear, youtube app is good... I haven't tried DLNA yet; the NIC is fast ethernet, not gigabit ethernet.

Reviews.Title: I like it and it works for me!
Reviews.Author: Zamazon "Zamazon"
Reviews.Content: I only had experience with an older 27 inch LCD. This TV is a huge upgrade for me. The picture quality is really good. I gave it 4 starts because of a little bit of motion artifacts such as judder, trailing and ghosting during the fast action scenes. I consider myself somewhat perfectionist, but now that I'm over 40, I did not bother playing with settings that much. I enjoy regular TV, movies, and sports. I feel good about this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Works great, Looks great
Reviews.Author: Scott A. Bjerken
Reviews.Content: Found this system to be very easy to start up even will multiple inputs like surround sound, antenna and VCR.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Ad M
Reviews.Content: The picture is amazing.  Seeing programs in high definition is taking time.  Mounted mine on the wall using Cheetah mount.  Speaker volume is a bit low- but it is the same with my other Panasonic.  Perhaps a sound bar will help.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY FROM WAREHOUSE DEALS
Reviews.Author: Landreth "Landy"
Reviews.Content: AWESOME TV!!! Everything you read in the reviews is SPOT ON! I research almost 2 years before finally purchasing this one and I am SO SO SO HAPPY with all of it's features. JUST A WARNING .... not all the items you need to connect the internet wirelessy come with it. You either have to use an ethernet cord, or buy Panasonics adaptor which I think is totally bogus on the companies part! Other than that, really really great TV and options for a starter smart TVTHAT SAID .... because of the economic times we're in, I'm ALWAYS looking to save money as I have been laid off and don't have extra cash laying around, so when I saw this TV in the "other buying options" menu, I was SO excited to see a listing for a "LIKE NEW" with all original parts and papers, just was going to come in a different box AND the price was so low I snatched it right UP!!Long story short, they sent me the totally wrong size, in a box that was falling apart AND the completely WRONG remote. Instead of sending out the TV in the correct size, they offered first a refund of $85 for the lost remote, Then they were going to offer me that refund to keep the TV, remote and all. THEN, they wanted it sent back, they would refund me, then I could order another one WHAT THE HECK - NOT the customer service I've come to know at Amazon.This went on so long, I decided to keep the TV and buy a new remote ($50) and all they did was refund me $100 (which was really just $50 and told me it's the best they could do because it came from Warehouse Deals and not Amazon directly, to which I responded, Amazon's name is on it, so should their customer service.So save yourself the heartache, the constatnt back and forth of emails, the lack of being able to call Amazon direct etc etc and just buy a new one, you'll be SO happy you did cuz the TV ROCKS MY BALLS OFF!

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV MUST GET
Reviews.Author: reggiereg41
Reviews.Content: Tv is everything I was looking colors are great as for gaming the picture it just a new experience. And the price was just right and you get led-lcd so you get the best of both worlds

Reviews.Title: As expected
Reviews.Author: Jared
Reviews.Content: Thus far, I'm very pleased with my purchase.  The TV was shipped promptly, was packed well and contained all the necessary items.  It was my first TV purchase online, but would do it again.  Great transaction!

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Lavey
Reviews.Content: We love this tv!  Having it on the wall takes up so much less room than when we had a tv on a stand!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Martha H. Saltzman "Smarty"
Reviews.Content: Great TV. Panasonic quality picture and the Internet functions work really well. I even hook up my Mac computer and use its DVD drive--at least for now. I also purchased one of those flat antennas and it brings in PBS and one or two network stations really clearly--all the broadcast TV I want or need. With amazon instant streaming, this is virtually "free" TV--way better than paying for junk TV.The only minor flaw is the sound but what do you expect? It is okay but, "get real," you need a sound system with any flat screen if you want quality audio.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT - GREAT BUY!!!
Reviews.Author: TEXASMADE
Reviews.Content: On Right Now! - Extreemly Clear Screen - Easy to setup - Easy to learn!I bought this one for my office as a monitor - I'm buying another for the bedroom!Can't Beat the Price...  If I could change anything it would be: The Volume is not that loud...

Reviews.Title: great TV without high price
Reviews.Author: D. Campbell
Reviews.Content: Very impressed with this TV. The picture quality is excellent - color depth and contrast comparable to our 5-yr old Panasonic plasma set, and stunning sharpness. I thought it was a gamble buying a big, feature-loaded TV in this price range, but now I'm really glad I didn't spend more money. Unless you are super critical or really want 3D, this set should do the job.Also, the free in-home delivery was fast, courteous, and the set arrived in perfect condition.

Reviews.Title: Great tv!
Reviews.Author: Donna Nelson
Reviews.Content: This flat screen is the perfect size, color is good and remote easy to use.  We're very pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: Very realistic!
Reviews.Author: Shelby Wyatt
Reviews.Content: I couldn't be happier with my Panasonic Viera! I read several reviews of different brands & kept coming back to Panasonic Viera due to the big price difference for practically the same thing. The color is amazing & I feel as if I could almost reach through the screen and touch the actors. Would highly recommend. Was a breeze to set up, too!

Reviews.Title: So far, the whole family loved it; however, we have not explore the whole potential
Reviews.Author: rodolfo soliman
Reviews.Content: Loved it. Will be more entertaining as soon as we learn its internet features. The color and brightness as well as the sounds are good.

Reviews.Title: Well worth it!
Reviews.Author: Kyle Jones
Reviews.Content: "Buy a used TV? Um... maybe. Buy it online??? You must be crazy!" I might have thought the same thing, but Amazon's return policy is so good, and they guaranteed the item, so I took the chance. The delivery was flawless, the guys carried it into our house and set it up in the basement. And the tv quality is perfect. You could have told me it was brand new and I would have believed it!

Reviews.Title: Don't think twice!
Reviews.Author: Ani
Reviews.Content: If you're thinking twice about buying this TV because of some of the low ratings, be rest assured that it's an awesome TV! This TV has everything you can ask for in an LED Smart TV. Nothing less than advertised. I compared it with a lot of other TVs with similar specifications and this one definitely stood out. The only caveat is that you need to buy a wireless adapter in order to connect to the internet but that is well informed in the description of the product.

Reviews.Title: Looove it!
Reviews.Author: Maria Urdaneta
Reviews.Content: Don't know much yet bout all of the things this tv can do, cause I haven't set up the wireless connection, but the image is great, and it has a million features! Totally in love!

Reviews.Title: Geat Picture, but.....
Reviews.Author: David G.
Reviews.Content: Although it is not heavy, two people are required to conveniently carry the carton that holds the TV.  You must keep it upright at all times.  It has a nice aesthetic design.  Assembly and hook-ups are quite easy.  Picture quality is very good and exceeded our expectations.  We do have an issue with the audio.  As with many flat screen TVs, the audio is fair to poor because the flat screen setup does not allow enough space for quality speakers.  The audio sounds like a very cheap radio.  Be prepared to spend an additional $400 or so for a good, not great, audio system to be able to thoroughly enjoy this model.  If you have questions regarding Panasonic TVs, use their toll-free number for fast and good service.  I recommend that you do not e-mail questions to them.  Questions I asked over a month ago via e-mail have never even been acknowledged by Panasonic.

Reviews.Title: What a Great TV!!!!
Reviews.Author: R. H. Runde "Bob"
Reviews.Content: We just love our new TV.  One word of caution:  don't try to install all the electronics yourself, unless you are really tech-oriented. We wound up paying a computer consultant to get everything going.  The result:  terrific TV viewing!

Reviews.Title: Best purchase ever made!!!
Reviews.Author: Alejandro Segura
Reviews.Content: I dont usually write reviews on products I own via Amazon, but this is an exception. This is my first LED TV brought via Online and I am totally satisfied with the product and the shipping.About the TV. If you wanna buy a TV with Perfect fit, Image quality and excellent Smart options (built internet) and the most important: cheap!!!..pls get this TV....Its one of the biggest electronics company (Panasonic) and what you get for the price is amazing (more that you expect)I suggested this TV to my parents (w/o 3D for obviously reasons) and I have not complaint for the investment.The VIERA Link is amazing (My parents has a Panasonic Home theather) so I connected via HDMI and TosLink Optical Cable, and the TV just recognized the HT and allowed me to control the HT with TV's remote control.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic VIERA TC-L42E50 42-Inch 1080p 120Hz Full HD IPS LED-LCD TV
Reviews.Author: A Customer
Reviews.Content: Love it good TV for the price I have to say Panasonic is the best and I have a Panasonic Blu-ray player DMP-BDT220  and Bose CineMate GS series ll

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: keme
Reviews.Content: Great tv very good upgrade from my haier 37 inch it very bright and have great colors also i like the memory card and usb.Only optical output so i cant hook my sony home theatre to it.Also great price and i got 100 dollars back to spend on amazon.I dont think i could have got a better deal.

Reviews.Title: VIERA TC-L42E50
Reviews.Author: Ruby
Reviews.Content: This set has a great bright picture. Its so thin. Sound is acceptable. Stand is strong & wont tip over

Reviews.Title: Value Packed
Reviews.Author: Derri Fukmi "Derri"
Reviews.Content: This TV has been flawless right out of the box. We hung it above our fire place and it is just outstanding. Flawless picture and sound.

Reviews.Title: Good picture - great value
Reviews.Author: Russell Goring
Reviews.Content: I bought this for general family TV viewing and I'm very pleased with it so far.  It's in a room that gets a lot of sunlight but the picture looks great overall. I connected it to the internet using the ethernet port and it setup was very easy.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice!
Reviews.Author: Dianna Helmrick
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv to replace a 32" flat screen in my living room.  Delivery was prompt; and, as promised, the courier brought the set into my home, assembled it fully, and disposed of the packaging.  He also advised me to let the set reach room temperature before plugging anything in (it was about 5 degrees outside and the set was in the truck overnight)  Following his advise, I waited until evening to hook up everything.  Now a month later, I have been thoroughly enjoying my purchase.  It has great features that I am still getting familiar with...I'm not the sharpest when it comes to some of the newer technology.  Great product!

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Viera TC-L55E50 Full HD
Reviews.Author: Clementina S. Diaz
Reviews.Content: I love my Panasonic TVHD.The best investment I ever made.The picture is so clear and the size is perfect, 55 inches.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Angelo
Reviews.Content: For all that you get, this is a great value, at least when I bought it. The internet settings are really terrible however, so I hope you don't plan on using it's internal software to browse. Also, the remote control APP they have is terrible. If they could fix those things, this TV would have been a 5.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at even greater price!
Reviews.Author: michael watters
Reviews.Content: This TV was a great buy, picture quality is beautiful and the price was wonderful. Blue-rays look amazing, should of got this before the Samsung I bought.

Reviews.Title: Very Good system for Price paid!
Reviews.Author: Abel G. Camacho "Lagunero Abel"
Reviews.Content: I did not want a 3D machine so I started looking for a two-dimensional tv that would provide a good pictuyre and would be comparable to my prior panasonic plasma tv.  This machine gave me the picture quality of my plasma reducing some of the detracting features of plasma tv's.  In addition, it game me the smart tv options I was looking to upgrade.  The only detracting quality for the unit were its tinny sound of the on-board speakers.  I compensated by obtaining the Panasonic SC-HTB550 Audio system. Now I have an excellent Audio Visual system with excellent capabilities and nominal cost.  I give it 4-stars because without the addition of the audio system, I would have never been satisfied with the Panasonic Viera TV TC-L47E50 LED-LCD TV

Reviews.Title: great tv and good price.
Reviews.Author: CHING YANG
Reviews.Content: It is a great TV and the price is really less expensive with the promotion.  The customer service is excellent. I will recommend this item to friend.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: jammy
Reviews.Content: This is one great tv for the price.We use it for watching movies and sports .And I really cannot think of any cons for the tv .This tv should be certainly considered if you are planing to buy a tv which does not support 3d and which is is in the 500 $ range.

Reviews.Title: Very nice picture
Reviews.Author: T. Morris
Reviews.Content: This is our first flatscreen so it's dazzling right off the bat.  My only disappointment is with the RCA/AV input(s).  I read the documentation for the TV online before purchase and thought it had a sufficient number of analog inputs for my needs, only to find that the two that they say they have share a common pigtail that plugs into a single jack on the TV.  If you have two analog machines to hook up to the TV, you still have to go behind the TV to plug in one or the other at a time if both are emitting a signal at the same time (or the two signals will mix).  It does have four HDMI inputs, though, and you can't have enough of those.  The analog machines I wanted to use don't have HDMI outputs, thus the need for multiple analog jacks on the TV.Update, two months later: I set up a wireless network and checked out the Smart TV features.  They include Skype.  Cool.  We can sit in the parlor and Skype from the sofa.  I got my webcam from my desktop and plugged it into the Viera and it couldn't be detected.  I went to the TV's help menu and discovered that only a Panasonic Viera CC20W Communicator Camera will work with this TV.  That's another $88 (from Amazon).  I am disappointed that this high-end TV would be so restrictive to Panasonic accessories.Update, two months after that:  I bought a Nexus 10 tablet.  I decided I wanted to stream Pandora from the tablet to my nice Panasonic TV.  Doesn't work.  The picture is there, but (after downloading an app called SoundAbout and enabling its sound settings for aux media (HDMI)) no sound comes out of the TV.  After much searching on the 'net and finding a lot of other people had the same problem, I found this:"If you are planning to connect a Nexus 10 tablet to the TV video works fine but there is no audio. The same setup works with my Samsung TV and an older Panasonic TV but not this particular model. So I know there is nothing wrong with the tablet or HDMI cable or other settings. This is supposed to be plug and play. After researching this issue online there are many reports of this same problem with no audio on Panasonic TVs with Nexus 10. Sadly an answer from Panasonic was to make sure the audio setting was on digital. I can assure you that the problem is something other than this that is unique to this Panasonic model and Nexus combination. My media player works fine audio and video on this TV however. If connecting a Nexus 10 tablet to a TV is important for you you might want to look at other TV models."Since the TV has built-in YouTube, Netflix and Hulu, this isn't a real big deal, but I'm disappointed that these two high-end products are not compatible and neither Google nor Panasonic has seen fit to address it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV!!!
Reviews.Author: Michael Hodgdon
Reviews.Content: Great TV!! Looks awesome and has a great picture. Not too mention the TV is barely one inch thick which look super sleek.

Reviews.Title: decision to buy
Reviews.Author: Robert J. Ghiz
Reviews.Content: 42" was the largest that I can install (wall). Rating of the Panasonic was very good. The picture did not require any changes for my use. The remote style is  very good, easy to use. The wireless connection was a plus for my Panasonic  Blue-Ray unit

Reviews.Title: Panasonic 55 inch led LCD TV
Reviews.Author: lBJean
Reviews.Content: The set up was easy and the picture is beautiful.  I would recommend this TV set.  So happy I bought a product that I can count on.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic tv almost a 5
Reviews.Author: Andrew R Ryan
Reviews.Content: This Panasonic tv is awesome! I love the picture. You can see a great quality image even at a severe angle. The set up and the menus are easy to use. Viera Link works great to stream movies online from Netflix and Amazon. Pandora and Picasa images are a nice additions. I have 2 minor complaints that prevent me from giving this 5 stars. 1. In order to connect to the internet you have to buy a wireless adapter that plugs into a USB port. That cost me $60.00.  This should be built in or included. 2. I can't run more than 1 Internet application  at the same time. For example, I can't listen to Pandora while watching a sideshow of my Picasa pictures.In all, I am very happy with the tv. It looks great and is close to perfect.

Reviews.Title: awesome tv
Reviews.Author: Dcelis
Reviews.Content: Nice quality, awesome picture. Cant beat deal with this price. It was really easy to set up,I have yet to test smart feautures.I would buy again

Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: dutchbrother
Reviews.Content: I love my Panasonic VIERA TC-L47E50 tv. Easy set up great picture and incredible with my PS3. Owned it for around a month and can't say enough about it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: David Cooper
Reviews.Content: The good:  It has a very nice picture. Sound is ok. It has a optical output so if you want to hook it up to your stereo receive you can completely bypass the tv's speakers.  This model also has some some great online optionsThe bad:  If you have a digital movie collection, it won't play avi files.  It does play .mov, mkv, mpeg, and mp4 files with no trouble.  It would be great if it incorporated some more apps like hbogo and showtime.

Reviews.Title: WOW!
Reviews.Author: David "here.david"
Reviews.Content: After reading all the reviews I took a chance, also Amazon return policies are OUTSTANDING, so what to lose except time.  Boy, when I upgraded from Samsung to LG I was impressed and did not think it could have got any better. Upgrading to this IPS screen was like the previous going to LG from Samsung PLUS even better (I know hard to believe).While the WiFi (with 3D) version was $100 more I did not need that as I can connect to my network using my WiFi extenders Ethernet cable hookup  (did take a few hours to find out I had the setup wrong) then the software update went smoothly and Internet access now works.If I could give this 10 stars I would!  Not sure why others are having issues as others said, use gaming screen setting is the best and my sound works great without any changes so not sure what others are having issues with unless they are comparing to 5.1 or 7.1 (my two other systems setup) surround sound.  For a direct TV sound it is better than all the other TV's speakers.Hopefully I will not have to update later with all of the issues others said they had after a few monthsUPDATE: It only keeps getting better...after networking and connecting to PC it is even more outstanding as I learn all the "features"  I viewed all the video on the webpage that Amazon has and learn I was missing out on some "cool" features...If I had not previously purchased my 3D (a few months previously) I would get a 2nd one of these as it is better then all my  Samsung TV's...

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Praveena
Reviews.Content: We are very satisfied with the purchase and everything works as per expectation. The only glitch (the reason why i am rating it as a 4 instead of 5) is netflix hangs when we click on a video the second time. The first time it plays and then when one video finishes and we select the other one to play it just goes to loading and hangs there and we need to exit out of netflix and come back in to play which is annoying.Overall the experience is good. Well worth the money spent. The Viera link is the best part of this and youtube is an additional bonus where we can link our Ipad to it and play it through the ipad. Pretty cool feature.

Reviews.Title: Everything is great (except for a few small things)!
Reviews.Author: gnurt_wang
Reviews.Content: I bought the 42 inch one a few days ago and so far so good. For the price I paid, I cannot complain too much, but its worth way more than the purchase price.Picture quality is great, bright where needed, dark where needed. Setup was quick and easy, but trying to access the setup menu for skipped steps later on was a bit confusing. Apps were nice, and video streaming was quick and easy. No issues here. Also no issues with packaging, it was good enough with foam at each corner and a few in between, with about 2 inches all around.The only downsides are that the usb ports are a bit too close together, even though I did not get the Panasonic wifi dongle, if I had, it would have been too wide and blocked the other one. A USB drive that I tried so far was average of size, smallest of the full ones without going to those micro ones, only allowed 1 to be plugged in at a time. Also, it does not come with a wifi dongle, and generic ones do not work. I ended up getting a wifi to ethernet converter and that works ok, since i'm able to use that on a different application if needed.I'll give it 5 stars anyway since the actual product is good and haven't had any issues yet.

Reviews.Title: Volume
Reviews.Author: Michael Horn
Reviews.Content: TV is just great, no problems hooking up to Dish TV. There is a volume issue. The volume at about 15 feet has to be turned up almost to maximum. Is there a sound system for louder volume?

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Vera Tharp
Reviews.Content: We had a 15-year-old Panasonic in our winter home that just wouldn't quit working.  I was thinking sledge hammer, when I found this flat screen that was inexpensive enough to convince my husband we should have it.  Now he's loving it.  The old one is on the back deck awaiting execution.

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: Donald Cyr
Reviews.Content: I love the tv it came sooner than i expected it was well packaged beautiful screen i would recommend to any one looking for a high qaulity tv

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for the money
Reviews.Author: Rich K
Reviews.Content: I am partial to the Panasonic brand and love this TV.  Wall mounted easily. The picture and the sound are excellent.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Gary J Liederbach
Reviews.Content: Did my research do I was not surprised by the quality of the TV.  Everything it said it would do it does,  Great picture,

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the man cave
Reviews.Author: Biking Brian
Reviews.Content: For me, I believe that a person should always get the biggest and best TV they can afford, even if it costs more than they want to spend.  This was the case when I bought this TV off of Amazon.  A week prior to buying this TV, I went to my local big box store and picked up a 43" Samsung Plasma.  I was sold on the idea of a plasma because I wanted a TV primarily to watch sports.  After watching the Samsung for 3-4 days I decided I was not happy with the picture quality and started checking for other options.  I ended up buying this TV from Amazon and I am completely sastisfied.  I currently have it hooked up through my PC in my man cave.  My man cave is a second bedroom so I sit quite close to the TV and I like this TV because of the 1080p resolution and the IPS technology.  It truly is a great TV for the money and I recommend it.  PLUS as of today you will not find another TV on the market at this price with netflix and amazon instant video built in.

Reviews.Title: nice and slim and decent pic quality
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: Being that this is my first flat panel TV I am still learning.  As other viewers have mentioned, change the display to game to loose the awful soap opera effect.  We're so used to a 15 year old tube type Magnavox 27" that the options to adjust and fine tune the display are a bit daunting.  Like another reviewer said, the red light while powered on can be distracting.  I plan to cover with electrical tape.Set up was super simple and everything was super intuitive in the on-screen instructions.  I intend to plug in an ethernet cable from my router and take advantage of the online stuff and may post more results after.I love the super slim design as this TV needs to mount on a wall in the corner and be pulled into the room when in use, but I want it to look like framed art otherwise.  It is a nice display to look at.The sound is super tinny.  I'm not a audiophile, but the speakers are worthless at anything past 10.  Good thing I didn't buy it expecting decent speakers.  I've got a sound bar on the way.  I'll take the slim design over lack-luster speakers.

Reviews.Title: Good purchase
Reviews.Author: kurt downey
Reviews.Content: Tv was a good purchase for the price.  The picture is very clear and the remote fairly simple to operate.  I would have given the rating a 5 star but I was not over impressed with the apps for the wireless side of the TV.  That's just more of a personal preference.  Otherwise I think the tv itselfhas a great picture and has worked well so far for the 30 days I have had it.  I would recomend it as a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture!
Reviews.Author: T. E. Mercer
Reviews.Content: Best picture I've seen in a while!  Worth every penny spent on it. I just love it. Easy setup directions.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a great price
Reviews.Author: Sam's Mom
Reviews.Content: This TV is super light and has vibrant colors.  It really shows the HD cable channels well.  One word of caution, I tried to attach my old DVD player to it using the AV cables with the 3 prongs, red, white, and yellow, only to find out it does not have these inputs, it only has space for HDMI cables, so I need to purchase another HDMI cable.

Reviews.Title: Display of TV
Reviews.Author: Special K Breakfast
Reviews.Content: Fast moving objects blur during action in movies. However, could be the Panasonic DMP-BDT220 Integrated Wi-Fi 3d Blue-ray DVD Player. Not sure yet.

Reviews.Title: Good Bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: Thomas Simmons "Big Ugly Guy"
Reviews.Content: Bought this during the Holidays for our Master Bedroom. Great pic, uses MUCH less energy than the old Panny 36 inch CRT, VERY light.I was surprised as I almost bought the Samsung (which was a few hundred more). Just need to get the network cable over to the set to use the onboard smart programs ,as well as stream movies off our server.I did try to use the Dongle off the Panny Blu-Ray player, but it won't work. Almost took a point off for this...get real guys, each device has it's own high priced dongle that works on nothing else? Anyway. The rest of the house is wired, so will work around needing a unique, overpriced dead end wireless dongle/

Reviews.Title: I'm not a TV guy...
Reviews.Author: Dr. Longlocks
Reviews.Content: But I have to admit, this is one decent TV.The main use for mine is as a large PC monitor.I hadn't even looked at TVs in years.  Now that I have this one and am learning some of its apps, I'm finding it turned-on more often.I will say, the screen is beautiful, to my eyes.  Everything they say it will be.

Reviews.Title: TV is fine, but Software lacking (and Ads on Volume Control!)
Reviews.Author: Ben Morris
Reviews.Content: Other reviews have commented on the picture quality, which seems fine. However, I have a few issues with how the Viera Connect software works. Most frustrating is that panasonic puts small banner advertisements under the on-screen volume slider. I would accept this if I bought a bargain-bin TV, but this is supposed to be a premium model. This is an over-reach, and not acceptable.The "Viera Connect" software functions - allowing you to use Hulu, Netflix, Amazon, etc. The interface is lacking, including an annoying chime for every action and general lag. I will eventually stop using that in favor of AppleTV, Roku or equivalent.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected.
Reviews.Author: G. Hoffman "technolepsy"
Reviews.Content: My wife and I were not impressed with other smart TV interfaces we've seen, but we wanted a 55 inch LED-LCD and this Panasonic met our budget during the 2012 holiday sales; that said, I'm glad we got it. While slightly awkward, the Vera CONNECT interface is much better than what we saw on display at BestBuy. We now watch more streaming TV than I would have thought, though the Amazon Video and YouTube apps still need improvement.Our first shipment was dented precisely as shown in photos posted by others, but it worked well enough while we awaited the replacement. Overall a solid four star TV.

Reviews.Title: good for the right price
Reviews.Author: chavano jones
Reviews.Content: for the price its a good tv. the sound isnt all that, but im a gamer, so i didnt mind. picture i would give it a 5 out of 5.

Reviews.Title: No regret at my home
Reviews.Author: camerakid
Reviews.Content: Compared with any other reasonable TVs image quality of this Panasonic TV is outstanding to me. I personally think under 32" Toshiba TVs are very nice but over 32" Panasonic VIERA is best for now. I like Sony but does not have good image quality to me. This is all about my personal opinion, sorry.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: David Miller
Reviews.Content: This is a reasonably priced TV with the features I wanted and none that I didn't (240 MHz, 3D, built-in Wifi). The picture is great. The sound is so-so, but I am using a sound bar and subwoofer, so that didn't matter to me either. The size and thickness are just right for the location where I needed to mount it. With a promotion that Amazon had, it was $100 off an already good price.

Reviews.Title: Amazon was outstanding; TV quality is outstanding
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the quality of the TV.  Amazon's order processing, delivery, and response to my subsequent inquiries was outstanding, way more than I expected.

Reviews.Title: Great LED and Value
Reviews.Author: Brian "BHG"
Reviews.Content: This LED is a great buy and the picture is amazing. The speakers are weak on the TV so I bought the Boston Acoustics TVee 25 for theater-like sound. Now I have a great LED and some great sound. I decided not to use the Smart part of the TV because I have a Roku hooked up to the Panasonic Plasma in my basement. Price was right too!!

Reviews.Title: Great Picture, Great Set
Reviews.Author: Sam H
Reviews.Content: Once you turn off the feature that gives the TV a very noticeable soap opera effect (the option is in the advanced picture settings), this TV has a great picture, respectable sound (for a flat panel), and a sleek profile.  Coupled with the great price, I was very happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful !!!!
Reviews.Author: AJC
Reviews.Content: AWESOME TV.......Learning new things everyday that you can do with it.  Picture is astounding...its like they are in the room with you..  Could not be happier!!!!

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: DAVID FOGARTY
Reviews.Content: everything the advertisement said it was. directions could have been better as we had a difficult time hooking up the panasonic surround sound. the help line was very helpfull.

Reviews.Title: First flat panel TV purchase
Reviews.Author: L. S. Klavonski "LSK"
Reviews.Content: Didn't really know much about LED/LCD/Plasma TV's before I started to research a product.  Picture looks great with very minor tweaking.  Arrived on time - undamaged.  Got the $100 credit promotion which I used to purchase a BluRay player.The Panasonic was easy to unpack and assemble.  Not all that heavy - unlike the 27" Sony Trinitron it replaced.So, we're rookies when it comes to new TV's but we're happy with our purchase.  Now the Sony lasted 20 years and still works as well as the day we bought it.  Doubt we'll get 20 years out of this one...  Technology is changing so fast.

Reviews.Title: Enjoying to so far.
Reviews.Author: Aion
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV because of the promotion and its reasonable priced.  I just wanted a TV to watch video and cable, and did not really care for any Smart TV features etc.  I must admit it gave me a good surprise with all the different features it has.I've only own this for a few weeks and still waiting to see if it has any problem.Pros:- Slim- Internet Ready- Apps ready- ZERO dead pixel (!!!)Cons:- Need component input (not sure why I want this haha)- Stand has no tilting or anything adjustable

Reviews.Title: Almost Perfect
Reviews.Author: Janet Marcum
Reviews.Content: This TV is great quality, super thin, and easy to set up.  I love all the options it comes with, but the reason for not getting 5 stars is because sometimes when we press the volume button, it displays a small advertisement.  Not a fan of that.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: RKS
Reviews.Content: I always had Vizio and this one got in amazon lightning deals, I wont regret it, its good so far, needs to play with picture settings but other than that the display and color are awesome

Reviews.Title: A really good TV for a very good prize from Amazon
Reviews.Author: Raj Rao
Reviews.Content: I was on a budget and so wasnt able to go for my first choice - a Samsung TV. But I am so glad I got this TV. I am amazed by the quality of the image for the price I paid.Viera Connect (the internet platform) is pretty good and although it may not have as many apps as the Samsung equivalent, it has all the important ones you probably will keep using a month after buying the TV. (netflix, amazon on demand, hulu plus, skype, games, etc).I used the wired internet connection as that let me skip having to buy a wireless adapter and it works well.Tested it with my Xbox and that too looked awesome.The only thing I had to do was to change the color from standard to Cinema.Will update the review with more of my thoughts as I continue using it.

Reviews.Title: Amazing "wow" picture but...
Reviews.Author: Old Moran "kitchen guy"
Reviews.Content: This tv has the best picture by far I have ever seen. I techy I am not. Just a guy (with a family) who loves to watch sports. We have guest over who cannot believe how life like everything is. The sound is fine. Not much different than any other tv we have had.However (and it may just be me) I was under the impression this tv was internet ready. It is not, at least not how I think of internet ready these days (like a laptop). We need an adapter which is not a huge deal, just kind of a drag.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for price
Reviews.Author: Forrestnr
Reviews.Content: This tv has a fantastic picture and just enough features not to be overpriced. The 120hz makes a significant difference in the overall picture performance.Remember to lower the advanced motion control setting to low or off, otherwise you will get the 'soap opera effect'. Turn it to medium when watching animation. Also, do not buy this tv for more than $550 and even less will obviously be a bonus.Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: WOAH
Reviews.Author: Kathleen E. Crawford
Reviews.Content: This TV is outstanding!  The picture is clear, the sound is clear and the remote it easy to use.  Recommended for anyone looking for a new TV.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Larry Drennan
Reviews.Content: For what paid i got a great buy. They set it up, when though the controls and took the packing material a way. the picture better than what i expected.

Reviews.Title: Comments concerning  recently purchased Panasonic VIERA television
Reviews.Author: keith lewellyn
Reviews.Content: I really like it. So far it is performing as advertised. I don"t anticipate any problems, as my understanding is that this is a very good set.

Reviews.Title: Color is great
Reviews.Author: john
Reviews.Content: The default "standard" vedio mode is too dark and unwatchable, once it's changed to either "vivid" or "game" modes, it's ok

Reviews.Title: Met Expectations
Reviews.Author: AGW
Reviews.Content: The Amazon price was the lowest I found plus they refunded the difference when they the price was lowered just before Christmas.  We didn't want 3D but needed a larger display to be able to read some of the small print that is broadcast these days and this unit fit the bill.  The only negative is that there are no external speaker connections except for the optical connection so we had to buy a cable and used surround sound receiver to power the small speakers we keep by our recliners.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Thomas Stockton
Reviews.Content: This is a really good television for the price. Picture is crystal clear. I would recommend this T.V. to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Amazon Is Awesome
Reviews.Author: James Funderburg
Reviews.Content: The product that I wanted was easy to find. The sale price was the best I could find on-line. The ordering format was easy to understand. The delivery was fast. The packing was excellent to protect the product. This was my first time ordering from Amazon and I wouldn't hesitate to order again. I purchased a 42" Panasonic flat screen LCD/LED 1080p/120hz because i was told at a retail store that it was the best for the money and size I needed. I made a good choice!

Reviews.Title: Best TV value
Reviews.Author: Brian Conklin
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture also love the internet features.I wish i would have got the 47 inch.I hope the product has durability

Reviews.Title: Good picture and easy set-up
Reviews.Author: og
Reviews.Content: This TV has a good picture. As suggested by other reviewers, I set the picture mode to Game.  Here are the other settings I use:Back light:  +90Contrast +96Brightness +46Color +42Tint -3Sharpness +75Bass +5Treble -5Balance 0It was easy to set up Roku for Netflix and also our DVD player.  As with all the newer TV's, the sound isn't the greatest, but then again, our old TV didn't have a great sound system either.  I bought a sound bar with sub-woofer that was very easy to set up and works great in a fairly small living room.The TV was shipped by Amazon and arrived in great shape.

Reviews.Title: What I expected
Reviews.Author: Luis  Andrade-Sinning
Reviews.Content: The tv has built on it an application call Viera Tools, it connect with Netflix, Amazon Video, Pandora, Skype. Very user friendly. I am satisfied with this purchase, it was what I expected.

Reviews.Title: Slim with a solid picture
Reviews.Author: mdl
Reviews.Content: The 42 inch Panasonic was a great buy. I particularly like the very slim profile, less than 2 inches and the great angle viewing. While the slim profile does sacrifice some sound quality most flat screens I've seen don't offer terrific audio.

Reviews.Title: Incredible
Reviews.Author: Jake
Reviews.Content: Went from a 32" to this and everything I watch is like for the first time again.  Amazing picture, super sleek, just an all around great tv.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: Paul A. Jordan "pj reader"
Reviews.Content: The TV itself is a great value with fantastic picture quality.  You can not find a "smart TV" this good at this price point.  Many features, easily updates. I did purchase the wireless adapter too since it is WiFi "ready" and did not want to run a cable up to the TV since it is mounted on a wall.  The adapter works fine in the included cradle, could not get a strong enough signal when plugged directly in to the TV.The other reviews about poor packaging is accurate.  The first one I received the screen was cracked ... but Amazon great service sent another one day delivery and it came in perfect shape.

Reviews.Title: IF ONLY IT WOULD BRING THE POPCORN
Reviews.Author: Steven Barras
Reviews.Content: I expected something really good since my commitment was to buy a quality television with Top of the Line features.  Panasonic Viera did not disappoint.  I love my sports and hi-impact action movies and a superior picture with superior sound was a must.  I have only just begun to explore all of the features.  Techies will love it for all the fluff.  I love it because it preforms like a champ when sound and picture are considered....This system will "rock your world".

Reviews.Title: Chris
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Tv, is great, love everything about this tv. Great picture nice sound. Five stars all around.  So thin and awsome.

Reviews.Title: 55" LED Smart
Reviews.Author: Jon Lodestein "Jonnie"
Reviews.Content: After 1 week of use, for about 10 hour a day, I'm very impressed, not  1 problem to report, We are retired and watch Television a lot, at this point I would highly recommend this Panasonic LED.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: lespaulio
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for about 3 weeks now, and so far it's been great. The picture is great and there are tons of options to mess around with. My only complaint is that (like with most TVs today) the built-in speakers are pretty poor, and it only has a digital audio out (not the traditional "red and white" audio output plugs). I wish it had an analog audio out as well, but that's becoming pretty much standard for TVs today so I knew that going in. Other than that though the experience has been perfect so far. Highly recommended if you want a great TV for a relatively low price.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Robert K. Rueckert
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this purchase and is my sixth panasonic tv in the house. They are high quality tv's and last a long time great bedroom tv

Reviews.Title: You are going to have to buy speakers
Reviews.Author: J. Curran "Subvet0166"
Reviews.Content: Got a hot deal on this from Amazon so thanks for that. The picture is great and the setup was easy.  This is my third flatscreen purchase in eight years with one Panasonic 42 inch for the another room that was bought 4 years ago.  I would suspect that improvements what have been made since that time.  Now I know that this one big piece of a larger puzzle. The stock speakers are horrible to a point which you have no choice but to buy additional speakers to supplement the audio.  My 42 came with sterio speakers so I was a little but surprise by the quality of these.  Good price but at least you will have to pay $200.00 more for decent audio.

Reviews.Title: great addition
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: This product is sooooo user friendly. I think it is a great product and I highly recommend it!  Buy It!

Reviews.Title: Impressed with this TV
Reviews.Author: Carlos
Reviews.Content: It was just the right size for me, as soon as I hooked it up updated the firmware via ethernet and everything has been working 100%.  The box was a bit banged up fault of UPS, the TV had a small dent in the back metal.  I probably should of refused it but did not want to wait more time for a replacement.  I got lucky the TV was not damaged... grrrr UPS!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Pete
Reviews.Content: You can't beat what you get for the price.The TV has an outstanding picture. The Internet connectivity options are unrivaled in its class. The black levels are almost as deep as a plasma.The only lacking area is the audio. The sound is tinny and vague at higher volumes. However, this is the type of television that deserves to be hooked up to a surround system.As an aside, the in plane switching (IPS) display is amazing. You can view a full picture on the TV from almost any angle.Don't get swayed by the 3D craze. I own two 3D TVs and this panel is just as good without that one lacking bell and whistle.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful TV
Reviews.Author: Vicky L. Thomas "Cossino"
Reviews.Content: RIght out of the box, this TV is wonderful.  The satellite TV (Dish Network) company had to come over and make some adjustments on the DVR, as it was our first HD TV, but after that, beautiful picture quality.  We purchased the Panasonic DMP-BDT220 WiFi Blue Ray DVD Player, and are using that for our Viera and netflix, amazon videos, etc.  The two work wonderfully together - so glad we did this.  I recommend both.

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV
Reviews.Author: Ali T "SC girl"
Reviews.Content: Was looking to upgrade my old tube TV to a flat screen, and my brother found this one for me online.  First of all, it arrived in less than 48 hours with the Free Super-Saver shipping, which was a feat in itself - just amazing!  I've had the TV about 2 weeks now and LOVE it.  It was easy to assemble by myself, not nearly as heavy as my old TV, and the instructions were very easy to understand - I was able to get it up and running with my cable box, DVR, DVD player, and hook it up to the internet in a snap.  (Just make sure you purchase an HD cable).  It's pretty amazing what all it can do- you can browse YouTube, Netflix, etc. with the click of a button.  The picture is very clear, and the sound is also very good.  I would highly recommend this TV!!

Reviews.Title: awesome purchase
Reviews.Author: Joan Olmsted "jlbwicks"
Reviews.Content: this tv set has the  most excellent picture and was worth every penny. It's one of the best TV's ever!!!

Reviews.Title: Very Nice 55" TV
Reviews.Author: JCinFL "JC"
Reviews.Content: Looks great. Picture is nice but IMHO plasma is still the way to go. I moved my plasma into the bedroom where there isn't a lot of natural light and got this led tv for a very bright living room. The brighter screen of this tv is great if you have a lot of windows and this screen doesn't reflect a lot of light. My plasma tv almost looks like a mirror in comparison.Good:Sleek designInternet apps and gamesLow glare screenGreat PictureNot so good:The product info said I could view web pages from my phone. This is not the case because I have it connected via ethernet. This leads me to my other gripe: I assumed I could buy any cheap wireless usb adapter but panasonic forces you to buy one from them for $60+. Lesson learned.The speakers are pretty bad but a home theatre solves that.Delivery was amazing. I scheduled the date and it was brought in and unpacked. I had the opportunity to inspect it while the guys waited. There was no damage to the box or tv. So far I haven't experienced any banding issues, or I just don't notice it.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic VIERA LED-LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Larry  Born
Reviews.Content: Great picture quality. Sound quality is probably average for newer sets with bottom mounted speakers. Watched a DVD last night and had volume all the way up and still needed a little more, just ordered a sound bar. Still a great buy for the money with free shipping and set up. You won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: C. Anderson
Reviews.Content: Awesome TV - aside from one thing: the sound. But hey, that's common to all televisions these days. Just get a sound system or a cheap sound bar haha. Great buy, 5 stars!(Sound is in NO way unbearable - some might even say good)

Reviews.Title: Panasonic is the best
Reviews.Author: Mr TC
Reviews.Content: I have always had good luck with panasonic products but when this TV arrived i was very impressed.  The quality of the picture and the light weight of it really impressed me.  i am very pleased with it and look forward to many years of enjoyment.

Reviews.Title: BEST TV EVER!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Susan Hines
Reviews.Content: The driver opened the TV and could not test it because it was below 50 degrees. He was kind and courteous and offered to remove the packaging but I wanted to keep it. This is the most beautiful picture I have ever seen on a TV! The price was unbeatable and the size perfect. I would run not walk to this set if you are in the market. It appears 3d and has beautiful clear color. LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!!!!

Reviews.Title: This is the best TV!
Reviews.Author: Book Diva
Reviews.Content: The setup was very easy. It took me about 10 minutes to set up the TV by myself.  After that, I played with it for 10 more minutes and almost figured out most functions I need to know.  The NetFlix is very good.  I am thinking about cutting my cable and just watch netflix using this TV.  The picture quality is very good. I do not see any problem with a TV at this price level.

Reviews.Title: Merry X-Mas
Reviews.Author: Jody W. Perkins
Reviews.Content: Ordered this for xmas.  Works great!  It has a great picture and was very easy to setup.  Very thin.  A great replacement for my smaller Sony Bravia.

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: Lawrence B Gandy
Reviews.Content: picture is great.  this is sold giving the impression that it is a smart wireless tv but, it is not complete for wireless operation.  the adapter needed for wireless operation is in the $60 range.  don't remember reading that. the only indication of that was, it being listed in the "also bought items".  i bought a router and cables that i hooked directly to get to the internet so, i am still not wireless.  only orther complaint is that mounted in the same location as my old dell tv there is a glare on the screen that wasn't noticed on the old tv.

Reviews.Title: One happy man
Reviews.Author: kitty rn
Reviews.Content: Really love this product. We specifcally waited to buy a flat screen until the tech worked the kinks out. This TV is just what we wanted. The picture is great from any angle. We also purchased the sound system from Panasonic. An extra bonus was getting rid of the old entertainment center, that housed the old beast.I wouls purchase this product again.

Reviews.Title: Like it!
Reviews.Author: Penname1
Reviews.Content: Great TV. No problems. Goes well with the DVD player I also got. Wish it had integrated wifi, but I don't really need that since I get it through the Panasonic DVD player

Reviews.Title: Superb !!! with ease...
Reviews.Author: HENRY V TRINH
Reviews.Content: I was a little skeptical upon the purchase of this tv since it was so cheap and because of that I was expecting just a mediocre in built and picture quality.  Oh boy was I wrong when the tv arrived.  The built quality is as comparable to the more expensive set and the picture is amazingly clear compare to my LG dlp I am replacing.  The set up was so easy and intuitive it only took me 15 minutes from unpacking to having a superb picture on the screen and doing all that without taking a look at the manual for instructions.  IPS led does make a difference in image quality when looking at the tv from an angle.  I recently purchased a more expensive Sony LED and I noticed a fade in image quality when looking at it from an angle however that is not the case with this IPS LED.I love this TV and highly recommend to anyone who might be considering.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: powerspot
Reviews.Content: This is my first led-lcd tv to use and I was not disappointed by its performance. It is easy to configure on start and has good picture quality and sound. I am enjoying it thoroughly.

Reviews.Title: Good TV, with some quirks.
Reviews.Author: CM "rhyle1"
Reviews.Content: 55' puchased in Oct 2012.I recommend this, as mentioned by other reviewers it has good picture quality after some tuning (used digital video essentials). Good picture quality and wide variety of connections are important for me (Comparable Samsungs don't support VGA).Items I think are worth noting:Good:1. Good variety in connections: 4x HDMI, VGA in, Optical out, Ethernet, 2x USB, 1x SD and component/composite WITH A CAVEAT: it requires a small cable adapter. It should be, but in my case the adapter was not, included so now I'm going through Panasonic's CS, which as mentinoned elsewhere is not efficient.2. I connected it to the internet via built in ethernet (wireless requires purchse additional adapter), and did a firmware update which went ok.Could be better:1. The TV will display ads! During power on short duration ads appear.2. TV Menus and Apps such as Amazon video and Netflix have a slow interface, I played around with them but ended up just going back the Xbox360.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Viera 55" with all the goodies
Reviews.Author: Con1124
