Reviews.Content: I have been well impressed with this product.  Great picture,seen from all sides of the room. Ease of operation. 4 HDMI's for more electronic stuff can be added.Very fast delivery.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding TV without 3D
Reviews.Author: D. Schaeffer
Reviews.Content: Panasonic VIERA TC-L42E50 42-Inch 1080p 120Hz Full HD IPS LED-LCD TVThis TV has beautiful color and great contrast.  We didn't have to change anything once it was hooked up. The screen doesn't produce any glare and the sound quality is excellent. I even love the remote.I don't seem to notice any motion problems with the 120Hz refresh rate and I'm sensitive to movement. Best part about the Panasonic IPS-LED technology is the visiblity of the screen from every room. I can work in the kitchen and see everything in vivid, sharp color at an extreme angle. I was looking for a non 3D type and I'm very happy.I'll eventually move this one into the master bedroom and buy an even larger Panasonic for the Den.CONS:-The TV stand is rather short, so be careful with soundbars. You will need one 2" high or lower. However the sound is so great you probably won't need one.- I paid for 1day delivery and it was lost for a week by UPS.  However Amazon was great and they sent me another that got here before UPS's tv showed up.- I'm not a big fan of 4 HDMI connections so close together on the side of the TV. However I can live with it. I have to figure out how to hide it since the side is so visible. It would have been great if they were on the right side of the TV instead of left.I highly recommend this TV.  -

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Francine M. Dabson
Reviews.Content: Great price, quick delivery, easy install, but you might want to purchase the Panasonic sound bar.  The sound is very shallow due to the mfg slim frame you need either surround sound or the bar.

Reviews.Title: Great tv, apps could be better
Reviews.Author: S. schaum
Reviews.Content: We have had this tv for several months and love it. Great picture quality and pretty easy to setup.  Only pain setting up was getting the hdmi sound from the tv (for amazon and pandora apps) back through to our denon speaker system since we don't use the speakers on the tv. Had to go through several of the settings trying to find the right option to do this, otherwise the sound defaults through the tv speakers for these apps. I use a fancy univeral remote to program most of the options and it works well. Not sure why you would want a phone app since you would have to go through the wireless for it. I have the wireless adapter for the tv and it works ok but with my N router amazon videos are still slow sometimes or lag and connection blips but router is far away on second floor from tv on first. The wireless adapter also seems to get hot.One big problem I have is I do watch a lot of the amazon instant videos from the app, it's convenient on the tv, but it doesn't offer the watchlist like other devices have. Why?

Reviews.Title: Nice Buy
Reviews.Author: Kirti
Reviews.Content: Product is good. Meets some of my expectations. Volume is little low but picture quality is realy good even better than Sony, Samsung and Sharp.

Reviews.Title: Very Good TV
Reviews.Author: Ram "ramprasad1980"
Reviews.Content: This is a very good TV. I was not impressed when i firsted switched it on. The default setting didn't really work for me. I adjusted to my preference and it is really great. At $739 i think it is a steal. The Sound is average and i expected this but i turned on the C.A.T.S option in sound and it improved it which i am happy with. Picture quality is stunning. I prefer the cinema mode which is awesome. I stream from netflix which is great. All in all a great TV for a low price.

Reviews.Title: Great tv so far
Reviews.Author: kielpedia
Reviews.Content: Only had it for a few weeks but no complaints so far.  The picture is great and it was easy to get set up.  My only complaint is that the entertainment center didnt come with mounting screws for the rack and neither did my tv.  The manual makes it very easy though to find the right screw which more than made up for it.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding TV but minor issue
Reviews.Author: mandk0308
Reviews.Content: Excellent build, and solid picture. very good in gaming (PS3 and XBOX 360).Trust me, i tested on Samsung eh6000 and LG lm6200,  all have lag and blur when playing FIFA soccer.This set is simply amazing in "game mode".Sound is a bit lack, but i think all thin LED do the same thing.If you have a andorid system, defiantly try youtube remote function. you can select video you like from your cell or tablet, and play on big screen(no cable needed).Here is some issue, not sure it is common for all E50 set, or just my set. Please advise.I use 2 HDMI port to connect my ps3 and xbox 360, and a external antenna which is connect to coax port.When i turn on my game console, some of my tv programs signal turns weak and gone. I check the signal strength, when HDMI working, analog signal is decrease around 20%.Weird thing is when plug my laptop via hdmi, analog signal is just fine and seems no interruption (same hdmi cable). Anyone please check and let me know.Other thing is USB port, i not sure it just support flash drive or not. when i plug in my external hard drive, tv shows power over load ,please turn off/on message.

Reviews.Title: Glad I bought this TV
Reviews.Author: Sheree86
Reviews.Content: I've had this tv for less then a month but already I am enjoying it.  It doesn't look fuzzy like I've seen from many flat screens and the sound is pretty decent, I don't feel like I need to put on surround sound just to hear it.  Its very thin and has lovely features such as energy savings options and a timer etc.  I expect good quality from Panasonic and I feel this is what I got.  The packaging was to be expected, there was no damage on the tv it was greatly protected.

Reviews.Title: very good so far
Reviews.Author: Martyd
Reviews.Content: I find my TC-L42E50 to be a pretty good purchase. It's replacing a Panasonic 37" LCD. Good picture and after messing with the settings for a couple of weeks I am very happy with the results. No technical calibration. I use cable but still keep an antenna connected. The tuner in this set is better than the 37". Without rotating the antenna I picked up a few more stations that I did not have before.Like many new TV's I think the sound could be better. It seems to me that if you can't fit good speakers in your product at least provide an analog output. With the 37" I have the headphone jack connected to my stero. 42" no headphone jack. To get optical out to my sound system will require a new purchase. So far I Y'ed my cable box audio output and sent that to my stero. With HDMI input there is a small audio sync noticed. It's better when using composite input. I guess I have to research an audio optical converter, but that's down the road. Not ready for Dolby etc..Had some difficulity getting connected to the WEB. Problem getting an address from my router (not wi-fi, hard wired) but it worked with an older router. I was able to get a software update and when I went back to my main router all was good. Why? Who knows.Anyway I recommend this TV. I don"t think LED edge lighting is the next best thing but I am satisfied for the price.

Reviews.Title: great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Marc S Osterman
Reviews.Content: I was replacing a 42 inch Philips Plasma. the Panasonic is easy to setup and at first looked small. Turn it on and it fills the room from all angles.

Reviews.Title: Sweet TV
Reviews.Author: Mark Twain
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace a 4 year old Samsung 40 inch LCD. This set has a much clearer and overall better picture. Plenty of connections for just about anything.I can't comment on the audio, I run everything through a home theater receiver. Well worth the ~$600 it cost.There is a lot of picture adjustments.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Television--Incredible Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: Mark Twain
Reviews.Content: This television provides excellent picture quality with a very easy to use/modify interface. After several reviewers claimed that their TVs arrived with considerable damage, I was a bit concerned. However, the packaging on the TV was sound, and the TV itself arrived in mint condition. Definitely worth the price and would purchase again in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: Nice for the Price
Reviews.Author: Luke Fontano
Reviews.Content: Needed to to replace a Samsung that had the capacitors of death problem. This was one of the best priced TVs in this size that included web features. Overall I am happy with the new T.V. Picture is nice, but occasionally there are some digital artifacts.Sound is poor, but most t.v.s these days skimp on speakers. They force you to use an external set-up which would be fine if they offered an analog out option. Now I'll have to upgrade my home theater if I want to improve the sound. The internet features are nice and easy to navigate. Connected easily to home media server, but it does not play all  media types. You may need to convert some file types to play on this t.v.So far I am happy with this t.v. really amazed at how thin and light it is. The few complaints I have are issues that are pretty common on newer sets.

Reviews.Title: Great television set!
Reviews.Author: Tyler
Reviews.Content: I have had the television for a little over a month and it has been excellent. The graphics are great and I haven't once seen any motion blur. The viewing angle is my favorite feature as the picture looks the same from almost every angle in the room. I also had a great experience with Amazon customer service when I saw the price lowered and they price matched it in a matter of five minutes. The tv is great as well as Amazon's customer service (Once Again!).I have had small issues with the sound making a buzzing noise at a meteoric level. I don't know if it is a television problem or a problem with my playstation 3 but I did not experience the same problems on my old television set so I would assume it's the tv.

Reviews.Title: Wi-Fi Adapters that work with TC-L42E50
Reviews.Author: kirankumar porwal "kiran porwal"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV a couple of weeks ago and so far it looks really cool to me.Although I have not got the wi-fi adapter for it yet and it is hard wired.Does anyone know what wi-fi adapter would work with this TV?

Reviews.Title: Panasonic TC L47E50 great so far
Reviews.Author: J. Bull "Windswell"
Reviews.Content: Ok, it's only been 3 days, but the Panasonic TC L47E50 is great so far. More detail later. It's so much better than my 3 year old Vizio. And it tunes in a lot more HD channels off the antenna. Screen is more reflective than matte-screen Vizio but with the ISP panel, I can sit off center, to avoid window reflection. I did measure it's reflectivity next to LG6200 and Samsung LEDs, and it was LESS reflective than those.Special Kudos to Adorama for fast shipping. Great price and GREAT packaging. The Panasonic box and styrofoam is not great, but Adorama put the whole thing in a larger box with solid foam padding at each corner. Despite this special packaging, the internal Panasonic styrofoam cracked, and the box split open at the bottom when we tried to lift the box out of the Adorama box.TC L47E50 is mounted to Monoprice full - articulating, somewhat stiff-flexing wall mount. This thin TV is surprisingly flexible (where the thicker Vizio was rigid). Pushing inward on left and right bezels to get the wall mount to flex in to the wall made it bend a bit, so now I sorta push on the bottom bezel with my knee at the same time. Angling the TV was no problem, and pulling it away from the wall didn't create much bend.

Reviews.Title: Cheapest and best TV from a tier-1 manufacturer
Reviews.Author: Meng Qi
Reviews.Content: Other reviews have said everything I want to say.  This is the cheapest and probably best TV from a tier-1 manufacturer (i.e. Sony, Panasonic, Sharp, Samsung, LG) for this market segment.I just want to mention:1. Backlight leaks and clouding have been fixed.  One of the user-uploaded pictures shows horrible leaks.  I saw some leaks (although not as bad) on display models at stores.  But mine has no problem whatsover.  See my picture (Singapore skyline, with black bars around the picture) and get an idea how deep the blacks are.  My backlight setting is 85.2. I mainly use the TV as a secondary "monitor" so I can play videos stored in my computer.  I hooked up my computer, blu-ray, and Roku player into a receiver (Sony CT150) and use the TV as output.  It is easy to switch among computer, BD, and Roku.3. Speakers are crap.  I don't use them anyways.  Manufacturers should offer models without speakers, which will reduce weight and prices.

Reviews.Title: Trust me!
Reviews.Author: Clayton Petzel
Reviews.Content: I needed to buy a 47-50" TV because of the size of our entertainment center and I was looking to spend as little money as possible.  I went to costco and bought a 47" Vizio LCD smart TV for $640 before tax.  Got it home and it was very happy at first, but then realized many disappointments.  Mainly in the picture- There were dark edges around the whole TV and it was not nearly as vibrant and fluid as my plasma TVs (42").  I did my research and came across this tv and went and swapped it out.  What a difference!!! It looks great (frame and such) and the picture is incredible.  Bottom line, trust me as I'm very particular, this is an amazing TV, spend the extra money (i paid $799) to get this TV or downsize to meet the financial restraints, you won't be disappointed!

Reviews.Title: Advertisement in the TV?
Reviews.Author: T. D. Le "TL"
Reviews.Content: The black level on this TV is not so great.  Its noticeable for a casual TV viewer like me.  The sound is horrendous on this TV.  Its in my quiet bedroom and sit about 8-10 ft away and its volume is very low even cranking it up high.  The SMART function of this TV is ok.  And yes there are ads and you cannot disable it like someone mentioned.  For previous/other models, you can disable it but not this one.If you bought it for $399 and use it with your sound system and a ROKU/Smart Blu-Ray Player, then maybe I give it a 3 star but on its own and you want functional TV, there are better choices available.  If they update the firmware and remove the ads, I'll bump up the rating.  That's a huge turn down to have forced ads.

Reviews.Title: awesome TV-great pic, easy set up its wonderful
Reviews.Author: Gregory B. Pearson "Nosraep"
Reviews.Content: I had decided to get a tv for my bedroom, good size room, read reviews that one should not have a tv that would overwhelm the room. So, after research, value , size I settled in on this 32" Panasonic. I like ordering from Amazon free shipping, etc. this tv had good reviews and some mixed ones. I liked the size, LED/LCD weight and all the right connections.TV is awesome, easy set up, sound is super, pic is great, and works great. I have a fairly good size master bedroom so could have gone to a 42" safly. I am a Panasonic fan and this is one more reason.Can't go wrong with this choice.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Video - Unreasonably Horrible Audio
Reviews.Author: Santha
Reviews.Content: Great Video Experience. Audio quality is unacceptable for a TV of this value. I have owned multiple LCDs/CRTs in the past. Even those 19" TVs would sound better. You can not use this TV without a Home Theater. To me that is like - knowingly selling a product with a deficient feature - not something we expect from Panasonic

Reviews.Title: So far, so good.
Reviews.Author: Kristofer Pierson
Reviews.Content: So far, so good. We use a drive plugged into the side to display slideshows, videos, and announcements. Easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money
Reviews.Author: Molly "Molly"
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV about 6 months ago. It's the first flat screen I'd ever purchased and we've been very happy with it so far. I love the amount of apps it comes with (Netflix, Amazon, YouTube, etc.) We use it for gaming quite often and the picture is great. The sound is a little quiet by itself, but our surround sound more than takes care of that. We also love that we can plug an Ethernet cable into it and use our internet with it.I'm only giving it 4 stars because the customer service isn't very helpful. The screen was cracked during our recent move and it is not usable. We had purchased the extended warranty for it, but it didn't kick in until the manufacturer's warranty expired so it is useless to us. However, we were so pleased with the TV that we're ordering the same thing as a replacement. The TV itself deserves 5 stars, Panasonic customer services doesn't though. I recommend this product to anyone who is looking for a TV with a few extra things such as internet and apps, but isn't looking for something super fancy.One thing to note is that it doesn't have the regular red, yellow, and white cable hookups for sound like most other tvs, it's all digital. We had to buy a special adapter for our sounds system, and we're going to have to get one for our Wii since this TV only does HDMI inputs. But other than that, it's been great and I can't wait for our second one to arrive in the mail!

Reviews.Title: Good quality/value
Reviews.Author: Hausie
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with TV.  Internal sound is not great & I haven't figured out yet how to route TV sound through external sound (non-HDMI).  May just need to upgrade to a newer home theater receiver to use HDMI connections.

Reviews.Title: Best TV Ever
Reviews.Author: K. Person
Reviews.Content: Arrived from Amazon on time and in perfect condition.  Worked great out of the box with a very good picture, but not great, colors a little to red and all colors to strong.  Set to custom setup, adjusted colors, tint, contrast, and brightness.  Now the picture is the best I have seen on any other TV I have owned, and I have had quite a few.  The LED back light and the LCD screen combine to a bright and skin true color picture.  I have only had this set for a few weeks, but I am very happy with this TV and would recommend to anyone who wants a medium size set with Amazon's great low price.

Reviews.Title: I feel I made a great choice!
Reviews.Author: Hard To Impress
Reviews.Content: I can not comment about all the techie features of this TV, but thanks to many people here who have, I chose to buy this unit and am very happy about my decision to do so. Thanks to everyone who took time to write about their experience with this TV ... much appreciated! In short I can say the protective packaging Panasonic used did seem a bit light, but luckily the box showed up without a scratch, so needless to say the unit itself was fine. This TV is easy to navigate as well as the Panasonic Blu-Ray player I purchased at the same time. The two units operate flawlessly together and I would suggest this unit to anyone looking to purchase a new TV.

Reviews.Title: Great but...
Reviews.Author: D. DeJong
Reviews.Content: I will start by saying that I am no tv guru by any means.  Simply put,  this tv is fantastic especially for the price.  My only concern is that the sound seems very weak and would be much better with a soundbar or something.Update:  Now several months into owning this tv my newest gripe is that occasionally the screen will 'blink'.  A flash of black then back to the picture.  It does this for a while then quits.  Not sure why.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Picture Quality!!!
Reviews.Author: KCP "KCP"
Reviews.Content: Be aware the shipping box the TV arrived was minimal.  I read another review the packaging was not the best and unfortunately it is true.  Upon opening the box I noticed the bottom center styrofoam spacer was broken in half.  Would have thought the box be a bit more robust as it was shipped via UPS.TV was easy to assemble and set up.  Noticed the picture had "refresh" lines the scrolled up to top of screen when input was selected to cable.  I thought the TV was damaged but switched input to PS3 and Xbox 360 and the screen was clear and crisp.  I also purchased a Cyberpower UPS and hopefully that will "cleanup" the cable TV signal.  The smart TV function, Viera Connect, is slow and redundant as I have gaming consoles for Netflix.  The embedded TV Netflix app does work well in Viera Connect via fast ethernet cable.  I've also purchased gigabyte cable and awaiting delivery.Overall the TV picture is excellent!  I was concerned with the refresh rate with the gaming consoles but did not notice "ghosting".  Picture was very good and even more so with blue-ray discs.  TV was light and thin.  TV was smaller than I initially thought especially for a 47" TV. Highly recommended!04/27/13:  Amazon gigabyte ethernet cable arrived and hard wired to TV.  Huge difference in picture quality compared to cat 5 cable.  Streamed Terminator 2 in HD via installed Netflix app and was amazed at the details on screen.05/19/13:  Unbelieavable, Amazon reduced the price!!!  May have to buy a second TV at lower price.

Reviews.Title: Superior picture quality smart enabled TV at a budget price
Reviews.Author: bhaskar
Reviews.Content: I bought the TV on March 6,2013 from Amazon Warehouse under Very good condition.  I was expecting a television with cosmetic defects such as dents on the back, but a flawless screen.  When I received the TV, I received everything with original box and packaging and couldn't find any signs that indicated the TV was used. The picture quality on my Viera is fantastic  I also like the apps on my Television.  I bought a N5HBZ0000055 panasonic wireless adapter from Ebay and it connects to Netflix flawlessly.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a great price.
Reviews.Author: Domi L.
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV (rated "very good") from the Amazon warehouse. I was expecting cosmetic defects, however there were none to be found. The TV arrived just as promised and looked brand new.I have owned both Samsung and Sony HDTVs and was hesitant to stray away from these two brands. This TV meets my expectations and then some. The picture quality is crisp and gorgeous. For the price, I would not hesitate recommending this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Price and Quality
Reviews.Author: rider
Reviews.Content: My Sony Trinitron finally expired after many years of service. I considered buying another Sony but this unit won me over because of the price. size and availability.

Reviews.Title: we love it
Reviews.Author: john keeley
Reviews.Content: this is a great sized tv(if you have the size room) we have it hanging in the family room and evryone loves it.  delivery was actually 5 days early, but they were on time and set it up.  when  I came home, all I had to do was turn it on.  I bought the cheetah mounting braket ,and within 1 hour itwas on the wall.

Reviews.Title: Get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Sunit
Reviews.Content: Good bargain HD TV.  I got it for near the $400 price point (after the amazon credit) so was not expecting much.  The picture quality is okay, as is the sound.  The wired internet connection is also a downer as I had to hook up wifi device to get internet content.

Reviews.Title: So Far, So Good! (better than our new Sony!)
Reviews.Author: BonJo
Reviews.Content: The TV is working great! Amazon is awesome!Overview:We bought two Sony 3D LED HDTVs the end of Oct 2012 from a local national brick-and-mortar store...a 46" & 55" KDL46HX750/KDL55HX750, respectively. The 55" is working fine/the 46" "died" around day 54 (THE WEEKEND BEFORE CHRISTMAS)- As soon as you power it up, it shuts off-turns back on-shuts off...then the red LED power light in the left blinks 8 times, pauses, blinks 8 times, pauses, etc.We immediately notified Sony. After having to repeat the problem to two different Sony reps. a replacement part has been "ordered" (they wouldn't tell us which part is defective). As of today (1/5/13) the TV just sits because "the part" has apparently not come in yet.How did we arrive at purchasing this Panasonic Viera TC-L42E50 42" LED LCD TV (and yes, I also bought a 4 year square trade warranty)?The "dead" Sony is in our Den where we & guests view television or use the Wii the most. As a temporary fix, we moved the 6 year old 26" RCA LCD TV from the downstairs bedroom/exercise room to the den while the Sony is out of commission. We've never really watched the RCA much, other than a few stations while on the treadmill, but it's really not a very good TV. It has two separate cable hook-ups: 1 for digital & 1 for analog (instead of sharing one) so you have to use a cable splitter. The Analog & Digital Stations are each viewable separately (you have to select "input" on the remote to go back and forth between the digital & analog) and many of the digital stations aren't even viewable (like CBS-only the analog channel 2 here in So. Calif comes up). The RCA is fine for videos/DVDs/games etc.It will make a good "free" TV for someone on Freecycle.That's how we ended up getting this Panasonic-since we have NO idea when the Sony will be, if ever, repaired, we decided to replace the RCA now to use in the den until the Sony is repaired or replaced by Sony, and we were definitely NOT going to get another Sony. My husband put me in charge of doing the research because HE'S the one who bought the two Sony's! LOLAfter spending 3 days of my vacation during Christmas/New Year's researching LED TVs (we really don't "need" 3d on this one but WiFi is imperative), I narrowed my selection down to this 42" Panasonic (I acually wanted the 32" but it wasn't 120hz so I went with the 42"), a Samsung 32" or 40" LED, and an LG 32" 3D LED TV. I was actually all set to get the LG 32" 3D because for the same price as this Panasonic we could get the free 3D glasses to use with the Sony 3D TVs...UNTIL I realized the LG I was considering was not compatible with Amazon Prime Instant Video! (GASP!). That was the deal-breaker.I ordered this Panasonic & the WiFi adapter (Panasonic TY-WL20U)from Amazon on 1/1/13...they were sent out on 1/2/13...both arrived on 1/3/13! (dang...FAST is understating it!).The TV was inside the manufacturer's box that was inside an outer Amazon box so you couldn't tell exactly what was inside (Hey!...it could have been a large piece of artwork...LOL!). Taking up the space between the boxes are thousands (or so) very cool little triangular folded packing filler "thingies" (for lack of the correct name). We had never seen these in packing before but they worked great! They're rigid and don't allow much movement. Very Cool.As for this Panasonic (I know, but I'm almost done):In comparing the overall setup of this Panasonic to the two Sony's (that were manufactured around the same time-September 2012) the Panasonic has been a bit easier overall to set up, even though the Sony's have "built-in WiFi". For now, I've set up the WiFi adapter to connect straight to the wifi router upstairs (Linksys E3000 bought here on Amazon-factory refurb), but I just ordered a network repeater (Netgear refurb off Amazon) because this Panasonic will be going into the downstairs bedroom/exercise room and it's a bit of a stretch to expect a good signal in there. I have no problem with the external WiFi adapter because I figure, if the WiFi adapter ever bites the dust, it will be a heck of a lot easier to replace than the built-in WiFi adapter!...which I can do myself without calling Panasonic.The overall quality:So far, the overall quality of the Panasonic TV, remote, & viewing experience is on par with the Sony's, maybe even slightly better. I would even venture to say that the Panasonic's GUI of the Internet apps/marketplace, etc is a little more user friendly than the Sony's. I downloaded a couple of free game apps from the Panasonic Marketplace without any problems to an SD card that I inserted into the back of the TV.If anything changes from this point forward, I will update.***NOTE***I had a teensy bit of difficulty getting Netflix to setup, in addition to sporadic network connections the first couple of days after I set up the network connection.If you run into this, try this solution...Solution:Simply reset your TV to Default in the Setup area "Set to Defaults".Then just set up your network again (I'm using WPA2/AES on the TV and Auto IP Address. I also don't broadcast our router's SSID for security so I use the manual set up of the network connection). I was connected in seconds, including Netflix.If you Set to Defaults, Be sure to have the TV rerun finding all the available digital/analog channels in your area, otherwise is will likely only show the analog stations.

Reviews.Title: should have been a 5star if ....
Reviews.Author: nodoubt
Reviews.Content: i would have rated this product a 5 star if the screen was matte.  the tv came with a glossy screen so you need to set the tv up in a dark room to get rid of annoying light reflection while watching.  also you need a sound bar or a hook up to a home theater system to improve the sound output and you need to buy an optical cable for your audio hook up but it's still a good buy for all the features that you get.

Reviews.Title: My view
Reviews.Author: Paul cates
Reviews.Content: Sound is not so great, but will be connecting surround system soon. Very satisfied with the set! has beengreat so far.

Reviews.Title: Can't get adapter
Reviews.Author: Patti "patski"
Reviews.Content: I'll bet this TV will be great - but, I haven't been able to get the wireless adapter yet. When I ordered this, it wasn't a suggest item and I didn't realize I needed it. Now that I have found that I do need to get it, Amazon is out of stock. So, I do have a TV and the HDMI cable, but they are pretty useless without the wireless adapter since I am not hooking this up to an antenna. Oh, well... I will wait a couple of days and maybe they will restock - or I'll be able to find it elsewhere. For compatibility sake & potential troubleshooting calls, I usually like to buy all the components I need from one place.

Reviews.Title: Swweeet!
Reviews.Author: Abhi
Reviews.Content: Absolutely brilliant!! Says it all. Been using a Samsung LCD so long and was skeptical to try a different brand. I must say I am thoroughly convinced and more than happy. My entertainment setup  includes: Panasonic Viera TC L42E50 Roku 2 for PLEX, Hulu, Netflix PS3Great for movies, games

Reviews.Title: Wow- Awesome Picture
Reviews.Author: Gift Card Recipent "Michael"
Reviews.Content: We bought the Samsung UN32EH5000 32-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV, but returned it as it was too small for the room. We are glad we did.For the Sunday ticket we have three TV's set up. All three are 1080p. This one is by far the best picture, especial with action. (I am guessing that is where the 120Hz kicks in.In short, if you buy it, you will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Mark C. Kipf
Reviews.Content: While this TV is not wireless (it is wireless ready), it was a great price.  The delivery and setup were great.  The picture is great with great features.  We are very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Really good TV
Reviews.Author: clydefess
Reviews.Content: Awesome picture, lots of features, easy to use.  Would buy it again.  I had DISH Network install it on my wall.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, poor sound
Reviews.Author: midd456
Reviews.Content: The picture is incredible. The internet apps are great, and the picture looks spectacular on my Netflix streaming. However, the sound is very disappointing. I don't understand why it is so poor. I bought the 42-inch, and the sound is tinny and very weak compared to my LG 32-inch. I won't return it, but am disappointed that I need to buy additional sound equipment just to have sound quality similar to my LG.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV - Panasonic you did it again.
Reviews.Author: Colin
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with this TV.  I have a 42" Panasonic plasma for more than 4 years and it is still working great.  I recommend this to all.Btw, thanks Amazon for providing such a low price and good quality product.  Keep up the good work!

Reviews.Title: A great tv!!
Reviews.Author: J RIDER
Reviews.Content: tv has great picture, would reccommend a soundbar for better sound..impressed with delivery and setup,worked out great!!..no dents,dings etc...always liked panasonic products

Reviews.Title: Absolutely amazing
Reviews.Author: annettelloyd
Reviews.Content: This tv has an amazing picture.  I was a little timid at first because it was not a Samsung, but once we received the TV and started watching, I no longer had any reservations about the quality.  The Apps are also very cool.  Well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Not Bad
Reviews.Author: Cecil J. Coupe "Cecil"
Reviews.Content: I replaced a crapola 32" HDTV with the 42" Viera. I'm pleased. Setup was very easy. Kudos to Panasonic for that.The DLNA features works great if your files are in panasonic proper mp4. They probably aren't. Handbrake software seems toconvert if you care about DLNA. It's a weakness that it won't play WMV but if Panasonic is cutting the cord of Microsoft dependence,that's a real strength to me. Your opinion may vary on the media server capabilities. I mostly don't care. I don't really care aboutor have tested the Viera Connect.The remote is not universal. Not a problem for me but you should know that. Also, don't waste your time with the Viera remoteAndroid app. It works and then it doesn't and not a clue what's gone wrong. Also kind of useless. Not a TV problem.I'm not a videophile that needs to tweek all the settings to perfection but if that's what you want to do their appear tosubmenus that will do that. Finding them isn't hard. Understanding them is not really Panasonic's problem, is it.As I said up top. I'm pleased and the price was right. Amazon delivered on time (UPS held it from being delivered ahead of schedule)and we all know three business days will always include a weekend in between. Not the TV's fault.[Several weeks later]I've got the Viera integrated into my AV system and with my remote control (Harmony 688) it is working just fine. The DLNA menu is kind of snazzyand if your media server transcodes (most servers don't and you probably don't want them too) .  It takes a few seconds for the TV to sync tothe selected video source when it changes HDMI ports. Not really a problem. It also takes a pause when changing channels on the set top box -not all HD cable is same. But, it works well. Looks good for SDTV channels. Much better that my old set when displaying SD programming from the same cablecompany set top box. The Panasonic is easy to set up, easy to look at and easy to navigate TV. The price bounces around a lot but I'm happy.

Reviews.Title: amazing picture
Reviews.Author: tom f.
Reviews.Content: this is the best tv i have ever owned.  it is priced right and the picture quality is fantastic.  the low profile (very slim) and light weight make it easy and ideal for wall mounting.  i would very highly recommend this television.

Reviews.Title: Amazingly amazing
Reviews.Author: Ergop
Reviews.Content: Got the TV delivered few days back and it is awesome. Absolutely no complaints about the picture quality and the ease of use. Internet and apps are smooth ..Loving it .

Reviews.Title: Phenomenal. Good for Retro Gaming
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: Great TV for retro gaming (NES, Genesis, N64, Gamecube, Dreamcast tested). Change the picture mode to GAME and no more lag. I used the New 3 RCA Composite S-video R/L Audio to HDMI Converter to upscale my retro systems to accommodate the widescreen display.

Reviews.Title: First Flat Screen. Great.
Reviews.Author: jjkjr
Reviews.Content: Like many people looking for a new flat screen TV, I researched what type to get, model ratings, brand satisfaction, and customer reviews. Those all lead me to this TV and I'm glad that it did. Granted, I just set it up this evening, but so far it's meeting my expectations. The set up menu and instructions are easy and intuitive. Watched the Simpsons and some of the NBA finals and can report that there is no lag or blurring, the picture is sharp and the color is bright and full. The sound is fine, but I'll hook it up to something else in the future.I'll hold off on giving it the final star until I can check out the internet apps and until I see if the set lasts as expected-I've always had good luck with Panasonic.Amazon, as usual, got it here on time and in one piece-I did sign up for the text alert so that I'd be home when the set arrived. The problem was the set came an hour before the first alert told me that it was on it's way. That could use some work Amazon.Bottom line-great set, great service.

Reviews.Title: No power
Reviews.Author: Dave k
Reviews.Content: 3 yrs old...would not power up...repair tech said it needs a new power supply and maybe a processor too...the cost for the repair not worth it with what new tv prices are...up until this point it worked perfectly...I had it paired with a Panasonic Internet ready DVD player...FYI...the display on this set was manufactured by LG

Reviews.Title: no wifi
Reviews.Author: sporkyface
Reviews.Content: What smart tv doesn't have wifi built in?? I wish I knew that before I bought it. I ended up buying a new blueray player with built in wifi for cheaper than the adapter. It really defeated the purpose of a smart tv.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV...but!
Reviews.Author: Mister R. "Crazy Reader"
Reviews.Content: The picture is great!  A few things you must know!!  You have to buy a separate WiFi adapter - Panasonic Brand, about $50 on Amazon.  I am VERY technical, configuring the adapter was very difficult, but it is finally working.  Viera phone support is awful, I waqs on hold 2X for over an hour, I never did speak to a live person.  Great TV, just keep these points in mind.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Kevin Gauthier
Reviews.Content: This TV provides viewers with excellent pictures and great viewing angles. It makes a great center piece for any living room, and I wouldn't hesitate to recommend it to any of my friends.

Reviews.Title: Good TV, poor packaging
Reviews.Author: lamusica83
Reviews.Content: After researching several different models of TVs I finally decided on this one. The picture quality is amazing, and the sound is adequate. The Netflix app is great, if just a little laggy when going from one episode to the next. BluRays look incredible, and when I tried a DVD even that looked great. The only negative thing I could say is that the packaging was quite poor. The box is very thin and when it arrived, one corner had been completely torn an re-taped, it was ripped along one of the seams, and the box was bending like an accordion. Some of the styro on the inside was broken as well, so the TV was moving a bit when I opened the damaged box. However, the unit itself seems fine, no cracks, scratches or screen defects. Mounting it on the stand was quick and easy, as was set up.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Shel-esq "Shel"
Reviews.Content: Sounds is not great, picture is great.  I was surprised at the number of high end features are provided by this TV.Audio output can be via an optical port or through the HDMI cable into the set which can provide sound to ARC compatible speakers (which are now pretty common).  HDMI cable goes to speakers and then to TV.  Great idea.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Shirley Pickens
Reviews.Content: I was a bit uncertain about ordering such a large item on-line.  However, the TV arrived in perfect condition, was not difficult to set up and with a few tweaks, was presented with an excellent picture.  Overall a very good experience.

Reviews.Title: Great Price
Reviews.Author: Roberto Vargas
Reviews.Content: This TV the resolution is amazing, very clear quality, is a nice tv and very light weight and the price is a steal.

Reviews.Title: a great black friday purchase
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: this was such a great black friday deal, thank you amazon!  I bought this for $800 and received a $100 credit for anything at amazon.  I love this t.v., great size, perfect HD and has all the bells and whistles to keep any techie busy.  The only drawback is it doesnt have wifi but i have it on my dvd player so not a big deal for me.  My family loves it and i will probably have this t.v. for the next 15 years.  I've plugged a usb stick with movies on it into the t.v. and had no problem watching them.  I also use the sony homestream and have no problems.  Just a great t.v. no regrets buying it.  And when it was delivered, top-notch amazon, they unpacked it and plugged it in to make sure it was working and if it didnt, they were ready to pack it back up and take it right there.  great customer service

Reviews.Title: Second Panasonic  TV
Reviews.Author: M. Schmidt
Reviews.Content: We had a house fire that destroyed everything inside. So I originally purchased a Panasonic plasma TV for our family room. I liked the layout so much I went with this for the kids TV for their gaming system in our basement family room. Please with the performance of it so far.

Reviews.Title: Good for small room
Reviews.Author: not 212
Reviews.Content: With my vision failing, I sit 3 feet away to use as monitor for my computer. Colors and picture good after adjustment. These smart tvs with external wifi cards that are brand specific and are expensive, a wireless bridge works better.

Reviews.Title: Good TV, but bad Service
Reviews.Author: AGS
Reviews.Content: The TV got delivered this week. This is the second TV I ordered from Amazon. The first one never reached my home, thanks to the shipping company, which wasn't even courteous enough to inform me that they'll not be sending me the TV, as it "was completely destroyed on arrival". Amazon refunded me the money and I ordered this one.The TV itself is excellent (but then I am coming from a tube tv). Has it's share of quirks like a delay when you try to switch it on, or go from your DVR to internet apps, etc. The manual of the product was outright vague, but then you can scour the internet to find a more detailed one, or use the one loaded on the TV (though it's cumbersome).The packaging was flimsy at it's best. I'm surprised it made it all the way from Arizona to my place in one piece. The next bit that got to me was that the package was not delivered to my door, but handed to me 3 floors below for me to carry it all the way up. Amazon could have used a better shipping service than plain UPS.Otherwise no complaints as of yet. Will update as I clock a few more hours on this TV.

Reviews.Title: decent picture quality
Reviews.Author: RC
Reviews.Content: I am not an expert on televisions or electronics.  Picture quality appears more than decent.  TV design (very thin case) looks great in the room.  There is an odd distortion that appears for 1-2 seconds every time I turn the television on, but I'm not fussed about it since it disappears so quickly.  Packaged well, shipped fast.  I am very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Fixer Frank
Reviews.Content: Great picture. Easy to hang because of its thin casing. Sound could be better, but because of its depth there's nowhere to put a decent speaker. Otherwise, it has all the features, wi-fi included. Would recommend it to friends. The price was also better than any of the big box stores.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Robert G. Buice
Reviews.Content: Why choose this rating - The product is EXcellentWhat did you dislike - NothingTo whom would you recommend this product - Anyone interested

Reviews.Title: love this tv
Reviews.Author: Zena Mcgill
Reviews.Content: This is the best tv I have ever purchased, not only was it a great price.  The picture is so vivid, it is like being in a small theatre.After reading all the other reviews I did expect this tv to be average,  It is not average.Wifi adapter is a must have, so order it the same time you order this tv.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a great price.
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: I should note that I bought this TV in the refurbished section because a little cosmetic damage doesn't really bother me.Pros:The smart, internet capability of the TV is the great.  It's definitely much quicker than than similar Samsung and Sony smart TV's I've used.  Picture couldn't be better and the whole TV is less than 2" thick.  It's definitely awesome.Cons:The only problem I have with this TV is that it's got two dead pixels in the lower left corner of the screen.  Not really a distraction while watching a movie and really only noticeable when scrolling through Hulu or Netflix.  Usually the refurbished section of Amazon lists the problems with the refurbished sets and dead pixels wasn't one of them on the particular model I bought which is the only reason I can't give it 5 stars.Also:The screen was really smudged up when I got it but it came off with a little windex: no big deal.  The box looked like it was kicked  all the way here from the actual Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Nice basic TV, great image, OK sound
Reviews.Author: M. Galloway "Musical experimenter"
Reviews.Content: I had been looking for a replacement for our old CRT bedroom TV, and finally settled on this one after months of online research and store visits. I have been very pleased so far, it was very straightforward to set up and the image quality is great, both with regular TV programming and Blu-Ray/games on my PS3. I did have to do some adjustments to the default image settings since they were pretty dim out of the box. My only down-side to this TV (and it's pretty minor) is that the sound is not as good by comparison with my older Sony. Specifically, it doesn't have as much bass so it seemed a bit tinny at first. However it still does the job, and I'm happy!

Reviews.Title: Awesome picture!
Reviews.Author: Pat S
Reviews.Content: A classy looking HDTV.  Just remember to turn off the motion picture feature when watching blu ray and the blu ray looks awesome!

Reviews.Title: Love this TV!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: A sword, even a nerf one, does not work well with a LCD screen.  My last Viera bit the dust this way.  I got online and ordered this one...almost two years to the day I got my last one.  Same basic specs...same price after Amazon incentive.  The improvement in technology in just two years is amazing.  This LED screen is not 3D, but almost retains matches the look.  Internet on board and built-in Netflix interface is far superior to channeling through the Blu-Ray.  Got one-day delivery for $3.99 with Amazon Prime.  Very, very happy with this purchase, although I would have preferred to wait:)

Reviews.Title: great for the pice
Reviews.Author: brian
Reviews.Content: Had this tv for about 2 months and its great. great sound and picture quality.I dont like the reflectivity of the screen though, if you room is well lit it kind of hard to watch.

Reviews.Title: poor quality
Reviews.Author: Jerome L. Perry
Reviews.Content: this tv is not as good as my 37'' panny . the viewing angle is pretty bad and thesound from the small speakers is very tinny.i''m dissapointed in the quality ofthis tv. should have bought an lg instead.

Reviews.Title: that is good
Reviews.Author: Eduardo  maya
Reviews.Content: upc  problems no tienen cuidado para transportar y entregar le dejan los deliver en la puerta y tuvo un small bend behing

Reviews.Title: Picture shudder's
Reviews.Author: Cathy Campbell
Reviews.Content: The speakers sound terrible like blown speakers and the picture shudder's not sure how to describe it. We have had very good luck with other panasonic tv's, our 55 inch plasma is incredible. Not sure what to think.

Reviews.Title: Good tv, false advertising
Reviews.Author: Janet P Vardaman
Reviews.Content: The heading says I'm reviewing a Panasonic Viera 42 inch  1080 120Hz set.  I am not.  That is what I ordered, but it is not what I received.  My set is rated at 60 Hz.  I discovered this during setup and contacted Amazon customer service. Since I was happy with the set and did not want to go through the return process, I asked for a price adjustment which was done promptly at a fair amount. Only rarely do I detect a blur which I would attribute to the lower refresh rate.  Since I am not that into electronics and this is a significant upgrade from my old television, I am happy. Setup was easy, and although it is an extra expense to have to order the wifi capability separately, everything is working well.  I would not hesitate to recommend this tv--if you can be sure you're getting what you ask for.

Reviews.Title: It was broken within three months which need replace whole panel.
Reviews.Author: yimin lin
Reviews.Content: I am not sure if I was just out of luck to get ready to broken TV from Panasonic/amazon. The bad timing is you can not return to Amazon after 30 days. Panasonic has local repair shop to handle the warranty issue. My case is they pick up TV without telling me when to finish. I have to keep calling them for update and possible loaner unit. Certainly the answer is always "waiting"  I am still waiting and it;s my third weeks.  Panasoinc has the worsest customer service among name brand. It's very difficult to find real person to talk to. I guess Panasonic is no more making good produuct as they used to be. My recommend1, Don't buy big size electronic item like TV from internet business including Amazon(Once you get burned you will know what I mean)2, Before pick Panasonic TV, think twice.3, Go to Costco. They have great wanranty for two years without extra cost. You can bring the TV to nearby Costco without  hassle.

Reviews.Title: the panasonic tv is amazing
Reviews.Author: Juan Saquic
Reviews.Content: i like it because looks very clear, and it has good HD, i like the screen surface I like the dissign

Reviews.Title: Nice wall mount TV
Reviews.Author: Erik Vandenbergh
Reviews.Content: This is a good TV for the value.  However, one shouldn't expect it to be amazing as it is only 120 hertz - you get what you pay for and for the price it is great value at 1080p 120hz.  I would buy it again from Amazon in a sec!It is very thin and looks fantastic on the wall, which is ultimately what I wanted!  It's a solid B+ TV!!

Reviews.Title: TV is good but....
Reviews.Author: dnwhsv
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied with the TV. Clear picture, great features. Only thing that made me give 4 stars is that it shipped without the power cable. Amazon customer service was kind enough to send me one in a few days at no cost.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: D Evans "Dr Data"
Reviews.Content: it is an excellent lcd. Replacing a plasma TV required an excellent picture This one does the job.Not quite as good, but price point was perfect.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Viera-42"
Reviews.Author: IamWoody
Reviews.Content: Panasonic Viera -I really like it so far but have not had it long enough to give it a true rating.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic TC-L47E50
Reviews.Author: Stephen F Dow
Reviews.Content: Like the TV, have three other Panasonic, but this is my first LED (all others are plasma). The picture is much different, somehow like videotape, if you understand what I'm saying.. Otherwise it's great, and nice unit for the price.

Reviews.Title: Nice tv for the money!
Reviews.Author: Amy Ditmar
Reviews.Content: We bought this on Black Friday at a big discount and it was a great value! We have a 50" panasonic viera plasma now and wanted this one for our living room since it has a less reflective screen with a slightly larger picture. It has a great picture and gives you the ability to change the settings so the soap opera effect goes away completely. Great tv!

Reviews.Title: Great picture, low power consumption, love the internet connectivity
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: This is a good tv.  The picture is clear the sound is fine.  The other buyers that criticize are way to critical of the product.  Buy this product if you have wired internet access because you can simply plug your network cable into the back and start watching.  I had no issues connecting to the Amazon Prime instant videos.  There was a very easy registration process that linked to my existing account.  also works well with my cable box although you have to keep both remotes lying around to access the cable and the internet.  The cable remote control does not do the interent access of course.  The energy star rating showed an estimate of only $11/year and that's if you watch a couple hours every day.

Reviews.Title: GIANT LEAP INTO DIGITAL AGE!!!!
Reviews.Author: Chuck
Reviews.Content: RESEARCHED...HAVE ENJOYED LONGEVITY WITH PANASONIC PRODUCTS OVER 35 YEARS..TOTALLY HAPPY WITH THIS TV.  NOW TO ENGAGE THE DVDR /VHS PLAYER  WITH IT, MAY BE A CHALLENGE AS RECORDER HAS A TUNER ALSO.  WISH US LUCK!  FRIENDS HAVE THIS TV ALSO, SO HAD  OPPORTUNITY TO SEE IT IN ACTION BEFORE PURCHASE.  NOT DISAPPOINTED.  SERVICE FROM AMAZON ALWAYS PERFECT, AND UPS DRIVER IS A DOLL HAS COME TO OUR AREA FOR YEARS, FUN AND CORDIAL, ALL GOOD WITH THIS PURCHASE SO FAR.

Reviews.Title: Great TV great value!
Reviews.Author: lehosner
Reviews.Content: Amazon sold this TV at a great price and it was delivered very quickly. It is better than I thought it was going to be, and I am very happy with everything about this product!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Ilya Rutman
Reviews.Content: Just a great TV. All what advertized there, including high quality. Highly recommend to anybody who is looking to purchase 55" TV. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Excellent picture, great features
Reviews.Author: E. Hardegree
Reviews.Content: We love this HDTV. The picture is bright and crisp, with lots of ability to fine tune the picture to suit your tastes. Plenty of inputs and lots of adjustments available via the menus. The Viera Tools is a nice set of features as well, especially the ability to access lots of other net-based services like VUDU and lots of movie-streaming services. It was easy to set up. We had it up & going in a few minutes. As others have mentioned, the packing material was not very good - our set came with slight damage to the finish on one end, but since it did not really show, we decided to live with it. Better packing would definitely be a good thing.

Reviews.Title: great deal for great tv!
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Jones
Reviews.Content: This TV is AWESOME!  Picked it up on the $599 super sale (just under $650 with sales tax), no shipping charge and it was here in 2 days, courtesy of Prime.  Simple to hook up with HDMI to our Dish Network box, VIERA setup was a breeze, streams beautifully from Amazon and Netflix.  I could not ask for more.  We replaced an old projection TV with this one and mounted it on a stand - easy to do as the TV is less than 40 pounds..  Outstanding picture and no problem with the sound as others had mentioned in their reviews... I do not plan to get a soundbar as I do not think it necessary.  ENJOY!!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Cynthia "Cynthia"
Reviews.Content: We love our new TV, picture quality is amazing. Great to play Wii games on as well. Easy to put together, well packaged.

Reviews.Title: So far pretty happy
Reviews.Author: Gardening Girl "Bonnie"
Reviews.Content: Have not watched very much, since this is in a second home. Picture compared favorably to the others we compared it with, only negatives are higher reflectivity in the screen than others (our other TVs are Samsung) and sound is average. Have been happy with Samsung, but Consumer Reports rated this TV highly, so we went with it. Price at Amazon was significantly lower than at electronics store, and with free shipping, quite a deal.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: WDW Texas "WDW Texas"
Reviews.Content: Delighted with this TV. The delivery was very fast using "Prime."  Lightening took out the old set. We have this new one on a serge protector. This set is an excellent upgrade in quality. Buy one, you will be happy.

Reviews.Title: Nice LED TV
Reviews.Author: AZ.Ven
Reviews.Content: This LED TV has excellent images and sounds.I recommend this model because is cheaper than others brands and has a lot of features.

Reviews.Title: The TV is awesome
Reviews.Author: Naveen
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV 2 months and and have not found any sort issues. One time I found the NetFlix app hung and when restored the TV to default settings, it worked again.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a pretty good price!
Reviews.Author: aaronbav24
Reviews.Content: Got this TV on amazon for $599. At first I was hesitant to buy this when I saw the price for this TV. Im thinking this deal sounds too good to be true. After reading the reviews for this product, I noticed that only the people that received their TV damaged are the ones that gave this product a bad review. So I took the chance and there it was. I received the TV from amazon in less than 7 days after choosing free shipping. When I inspected the box, it look like everything was fine so I opened it and set it up for about 5 mins. When I turned on the set, I was very happy withe picture. Bottom line is, I would recommend this TV to all my friends.

Reviews.Title: Great TV - Easy to Use, Clear Picture, Very Compatible
Reviews.Author: Big Rick C
Reviews.Content: I did months of exhaustive research with LED TVs.  I went to the big box stores, asked questions, examined the floor displays, and read reviews online from various outlets.  I will say that almost a month in, this TV is great.  I use it for my digital cable, Blu-Ray, and hook up my PC to it.  I run the sound through my home theater system for the previously mentioned items.  So far, no problems and lots of compliments.  The setup was incredibly easy, the instructions are easy to follow and the jacks are clearly labeled.  The TV is very light.  The picture is very crisp and the settings are easily adjustable.  The remote is easy to use.  This has all of the features of any LG or Samsung, only was about $400 cheaper ($799 w/ free shipping - great sale price!!).  Even at the price of $999, I would say this is a better deal than the LG or Samsung counterparts as it has all of the features, comparable jacks.  The features this TV has are the same as most other non-3D TVs.  Purchasing with Amazon was flawless - delivery in two days, no shipping charge, no sales tax!!!My previous TV was a Sony 33" Trinitron.  It lasted almost 10 years, but I have a Panasonic in my bedroom that is going on 20 years and no flaws at all.  My DVD player is a Panasonic and works like a charm.  So, I am biased writing on Panasonic because I have had such a positive history with them.  For what is worth, one of the guys at the big box stores said they get fewer Panasonic returns than any other brand.  That is nice, but they also don't push Panasonic like they do LG and Samsung.This TV has 2 HDMI inputs (one for my Blu Ray and one for my Cable Box), 1 PC SGVA jack, 4 USBs, Ethernet, wi-fi ready (not built in, so I use my Blu Ray which has built in WiFi), and one jack that handles component / audio in.  The only thing I messed up on in my research was that the only audio out was an optical jack only.  There is no red / white jacks for audio out.  I was worried when I bought the TV as my Onkyo 602 receiver does not have USB / HDMI inputs and I was going to have to upgrade my receiver.  However, I ran everything in through my television and the audio out to my Onkyo works perfectly for everything (DVD, Cable, PC Games, etc.).

Reviews.Title: YOU CAN DO BETTER !!
Reviews.Author: D. Bacsoka "DJB"
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for over a week now and I think that for the price this is solid TV with a life-like picture. I've found the TV settings to be intuitive and easy enough to change but you will have to do MAJOR tweaks in the picture to get a good picture.  Sports are just OK.  I do have a sharp eye.  I see the images blur and breakdown sometimes and find that things seem to work best with motion setting on "weak" or "off" but it's still far from perfect.  I thought the 120hz refresh rate would be great for sports when on full blast - but it's not.  As for the sound, it's better than I thought it would be - perhaps this was the most pleasant surprise about this TV.INTERNET SMART FEATURES / AMAZON VIDEO:Regarding the  "Smart TV" function: (I would only give this function ONE and HALF STAR).This TV is not so smart.  Honestly, one of the main reasons I'm thinking of returning this TV is because the Amazon video application is SO BAD.  Imagine a streaming video application without a 'cue' or watch list?  It's here!  Imagine an application where fast forward and rewind functions will make you pine for your old VHS system? That's here too! It's so bad, it's absolutely incredible. You can't view what you are fast forwarding at all. Haha You literally have to rewind or fast forward a video completely blind and hope you hit the right spot.  Imagine how annoyingly painful this is. Also, if you are watching a TV series it will provide you with no evidence that you've ever watched it let alone what episode you left off at. But this smart TV will not prevent you from writing down in a note pad what episode you left off at.  Phew, this TV may not be smart, but at least it's not evil.It's apparent that ZERO effort was put into this Amazon application. Ironically, it's one of the only applications they have. (Sure you can buy some third rate games, but if you do this please email me because I have a lovely bridge to sell you somewhere in Brooklyn if you do this.) Look, I love Amazon video - but the application on this TV almost ruins the TV for me: IT'S HORRIBLE on VIERA. It's an application that exhibits disdain for it's users.  You have to experience this for yourself, ...or NOT.Also, this model requires you to purchase a $62 wireless adapter for the privilege of having this shoddy experience.  Can you say "nickle and dime", or how about, "rip off"?  I can.NETFLIX:I must say that the Netflix experience on this TV is much better than Amazon Video - but that's not saying too much is it?  I've noticed a blinking black screen several times repetitively on 2 shows.  When this happened it was almost unwatchable.  Again, it's here that the software interface could use improvement and is a glitch that I never noticed on a Roku.  But hey, at least Netfix seemed to put their C team on this application, and that's a big improvement over the team Amazon put on theirs; a small yet robust team of binge drinking junior college dropouts.VIERA LESSON:  Stick to a dumber TV and get a ROKU for the likes of Amazon and Netflix.  The Roku is cheaper (than the wireless adaptor, works better, gets frequent updates, has many many more app choices, and has much better overall features, bells, whistles and attention to detail.SO WHY IS THE VIERA 'SMART' EXPERIENCE SOOOOO BAD??:I'm starting to think the experience is so much better on the Roku in large part because it was such a big seller. The other half is because the people at Roku seem to 'care'. Imagine that.  Roku gets frequent over the air updates.  Don't underestimate this.  Think about your smart phone and it's software updates.  Smart TV's like the Viera line simply aren't getting much attention from the likes of Amazon and Netflix. Panasonic must have very little pull with these vendors because the extreme negligence is palpable. The apps are so bad that I have no trouble imagining the Viera department in Panasonic's R&D; wing to be filled with employees doing things like finger painting and lighting their farts on fire - ALL day long.  I've searched for "updates Viera" online and it seems the last software update was in March of 2012.  Almost comical.  Hey Amazon, what are you waiting for?  Fix this garbage application please - your company is better than this!  I'm a prime member dammit!  (I'm sure this will get someone right on the case).* I also noticed that the new 2013 Viera Tv's will be full of all kinds of nifty features.  It doesn't appear that this Viera will be getting any of these software enhancements.  Way to treat your customers Panasonic!----------------ADS?  (UPDATED)I was really annoyed by the appearance of sponsored banner ads on the volume rocker and when turning on the TV (also in the internet section) but it was pointed out to me that you can turn these off.  I still think it's annoying that you have to dig through advance settings to find the turn off switch for these - but at least it's there.-----------------AMAZON TV PRICE GUARANTEE = NOT SO GREATLastly, I'd like to point out that the  "Amazon TV Low Price Guarantee" does not include any other promotions.  Perhaps this is in the very fine print, but who reads that? Just 4 days after I bought this TV not only did the price drop $50, but Amazon started issuing a $100 promotional credit to anyone who bought it.  I noticed this and was credited with the $50 difference for the price drop - but as for the $100 promotional credit I was told that I was out of luck.  Really?BUT the service rep came to the rescue and provided me with a solution to get this $100 promotional credit:All I would have to do was to send the current TV (back because of one of my complaints), order and pay for a new one - the new TV would get the $100 promotion they are unwilling to credit me with.  Then I could repack/rebox the old TV and send it back for a full refund.I said, that this seemed, wasteful, inefficient, and unproductive for both me and Amazon.  Why pay all these unnecessary shipping and labor costs and waste this time for what would ultimately just result in a TV swap when I was (reluctantly) willing to keep the TV?  I again asked Amazon, to please just credit me with the $100 promotion and I'll keep this TV and save all of us the trouble of having to play the dum dum game of re-box, ship, wait, receive, carry, unbox, unclutter, again.  She apologetically reported that this would be impossible, but encouraged me to still send the current TV back, and take advantage of the promotion.Really Amazon?  No wonder you are still in the red.  At least this sort of nonsense keeps my UPS driver really busy and maybe, his salary up.  And that's great, because he's a nice guy.------------------------I'm keeping my eye out for other TV's during the return window.  Despite this TV's low price, the lack of detail paid to the software, combined with certain small picture issues makes me feel like those responsible for making this TV and the "smart' experience never loved it, so why should I?DJB

Reviews.Title: Fabulous picture and good sound for a bedroom.
Reviews.Author: M. Hill "cookbook collector"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV based on reading the reviews of others and I was not disappointed. I have it connected to a Panasonic blu ray dvd player with internet streaming, so I have not used th internet applications on the TV.  I plan to get a non-internet connectable dvd player and a wi-fi adapter soon and will see how well the TV is at streaming Netflix. As others have mentioned I resent having to buy a separate internet adapter to stream the wi-fi.  It should have been built into the set.  But, having said that I still could not decrease the rating for the TV overall.I am not a techie, but from my point of view the picture is truly beautiful.Most who buy this TV will be very happy.I've now had TV over a year and still love it.  Now I have the adapter to stream Amazon movies and it works perfectly.
